sentences.c: Human language is productive, an open-ended communication system, whereas no other communication system has this property.
sentences.cn: 人类的语言是多产的，是一个开放的交流系统，而其他交流系统都没有这种特性。

sentences.c: A warming climate could lead to a more fragrant world, but it might disturb an intricate communication system used by plants.
sentences.cn: 气候变暖可能会导致一个更芳香的世界，但它可能会扰乱植物使用的复杂的通讯系统。

trans.cn: 个人兴趣：指个人对某种事物或活动的喜好、爱好、追求等。

sentences.c: A clear recognition of self orientation and personal interest will decide whether you will tick the box of vocational college or university.
sentences.cn: 对自我定位和个人兴趣的清晰认识将决定你会选择职业学院，还是大学。

sentences.c: First, let me declare my personal interest.
sentences.cn: 首先我声明我个人兴趣所在。

sentences.c: Takes a personal interest that things are done right.
sentences.cn: 兼顾了个人兴趣，事情就好办多了。

sentences.c: Managing original contracts and remind secretary of department to renew while the contract period is gonging to expire.
sentences.cn: 管理各部门合同原件，并在合同快到期时提醒部门续签合同。

sentences.c: The Navy Department moved into the east wing in 1879, where elaborate wall and ceiling stenciling and marquetry floors decorated the office of the Secretary.
sentences.cn: 海军部于1879年迁入东翼，其部长办公室里墙和天花板采用精致的镂印，地板采用镶嵌工艺。

sentences.c: The department secretary will give you a schedule of the applicants' visits.
sentences.cn: 部门秘书会给你一份申请人来访的时间表。

trans.cn: 电脑办公：指在办公场所使用电脑进行工作和管理的活动。

sentences.c: Be familiar with computer office software.
sentences.cn: 熟悉使用计算机办公软件。

sentences.c: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.cn: 供应商把计算机耗材、办公设备及家具加进他们的产品范围中。

sentences.c: I don't want that hulking great computer in my office.
sentences.cn: 我不要把那台又笨又大的计算机放在我的办公室。

sentences.c: An archive of past assignments and exams can be found in the study materials section of this course site.
sentences.cn: 可以在本课程的研习资料部分里找到过去的作业和试题文件。

trans.cn: 国际声誉：指一个人、组织或国家在国际上所享有的声誉和信誉。

sentences.c: She has an international reputation among film cognoscenti.
sentences.cn: 她在国际电影行家中享有盛名。

sentences.c: Under its new conductor, the orchestra has established an international reputation.
sentences.cn: 在新指挥的领导下，这个乐团建立了国际声誉。

sentences.c: Will it enhance our country's international reputation?
sentences.cn: 有没有为我国增加国际声誉？

trans.cn: 历史研究：对过去事件、人物、文化等进行深入探讨和分析的学术活动。

sentences.c: This paper belongs to family history research category.
sentences.cn: 本文属于家庭史研究范畴。

sentences.c: Life history research lies at the heart of evolutionary ecology.
sentences.cn: 生活史研究为进化生态学研究的核心内容之一。

sentences.c: Archives are the most basic historical materials of history research.
sentences.cn: 档案是研究历史的最基本史料之一。

trans.cn: 会议报告：指的是由众议院和参议院通过会议委员会协商达成的一项法案的最终版本。

sentences.c: Conference report rich content, and combining with the practical work of everyone in the practice and experience for communication.
sentences.cn: 会议报告内容丰富，同时结合大家在实际工作中的实践和体会进行交流。

sentences.c: Put aside the macroscopic block such as the system of the press, the biggest difficulty of conference report is the lack of real dialogue.
sentences.cn: 抛开新闻体制等宏观方面的阻碍不谈，对话精神的缺失可以看作是会议报道最大的瓶颈。

sentences.c: On the eve of the conference, WHO will launch the World health report 2008 entitled Primary health care: now more than ever.
sentences.cn: 世卫组织将在会议前夕发布《2008年世界卫生报告》，题为“初级卫生保健：过去重要，现在更重要”。

trans.cn: 建筑平面图：建筑物楼层的平面图，与立面图相区别。也可以指第一版或基本计划。

sentences.c: The ground plan is rectangular, oriented e.
sentences.cn: 地面的计划是矩形，面向e。

sentences.c: The actual living experience is three-dimensional and more fluid than what a ground plan can describe.
sentences.cn: 实际的生活经验是三维的、比一个平面图更能清晰地表达。

sentences.c: The process begins with the geometric construction of circles traced on the ground at sunrise to orientate the temple and to lay out the ground plan.
sentences.cn: 这种过程是在日出时以阳光映照在地面上的圆形几何构造为起点定位寺庙，并由此展开其建筑群。

trans.cn: 聊天室：一种在线交流平台，用户可以通过文字、语音或视频与其他用户实时互动。

sentences.c: These include online games, chat rooms and so on.
sentences.cn: 这些包括网络游戏、聊天室等等。

sentences.c: These chat rooms take up a lot of my time.
sentences.cn: 这些聊天室占去了我大量时间。

sentences.c: This phenomenon often occurs in chat rooms and forum boards.
sentences.cn: 这种现象通常发生在聊天室和论坛上。

trans.cn: 计算机技能：指在计算机操作、软件应用、网络使用等方面的技能和知识。

sentences.c: Literacy now includes elementary computer skills.
sentences.cn: 有文化现在包括基本的计算机技能。

sentences.c: This course is designed for people wishing to update their computer skills.
sentences.cn: 这门课程是为想要提高电脑技术的人而设的。

sentences.c: There is no doubt that in the Internet era, one must get a good command of computer skills to be successful in getting a good job.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，互联网时代，人们必须掌握良好的计算机技能才能获得一份好工作。

trans.cn: 教职员工：指教育机构中的教学人员，包括基础教育和高等教育机构的教师。

sentences.c: We have a special Valentine's Day message dedicated from the teaching staff to the students.
sentences.cn: 我们有一份特别的情人节祝辞，是教职工献给学生的。

sentences.c: You will find that the teaching staff take an informal, although disciplined, approach.
sentences.cn: 大家将发现老师会以一种友好轻松而又严谨的方式来教学。

sentences.c: The teaching staff includes internationally known manga researchers and active authors and editors.
sentences.cn: 精华大学漫画系的师资包括国际知名漫画研究员和圈内活跃的漫画作者及编辑。

sentences.c: Focal listening garners detail from any sound and global listening brings expansion through the whole field of sound .
sentences.cn: 焦点式聆听累积起任何声音的细节，而总括式聆听则透过声音的整个领域带来扩展。

sentences.c: You're listening to Steve Sawyer of the Global wind Energy Council, a trade association that represents the wind industry at the international level.
sentences.cn: 您正在收听到的是世界风能协会职员史蒂夫·索耶的讲话。世界风能协会是国际风力发电产业的同行公会。

sentences.c: Though you wouldn't know it from listening to the media, methane has been contributing to global warming more recently.
sentences.cn: 虽然你不会从媒体了解到这些，但近期甲烷确实对全球变暖产生了更大的影响。

sentences.c: Such things as facial expressions, body languages and eye contacts play important parts in giving a speech.
sentences.cn: 诸如面部表情、肢体语言和眼神交流等在演讲中发挥着重要作用。

sentences.c: Along with surgery to change the shape of his eyes, Xiahn wears dark eye contacts and dyes his hair black.
sentences.cn: 除了通过整容手术改变了眼睛的形状，夏恩还佩戴深色美瞳，并把头发染成黑色。

sentences.c: So, on the one hand I was expecting to have a eye contacts with you, one the other hand I was afraid of being discovered by you that I was looking at you secretly.
sentences.cn: 所以一方面我很期待能和你对上眼，另一方面由于我的腼腆，我又害怕被你发现我一直在偷偷看你。

trans.cn: 卡片目录：一种目录系统，通常用于图书馆或商业机构，由一组抽屉或托盘（通常是小抽屉的柜子）组成，上面放满了卡片（索引卡），其中各种物品被索引（即注册、列出并简要描述其位置和其他重要点）。

sentences.c: You can find it in the card catalogue.
sentences.cn: 你可以在卡片目录中找到。

sentences.c: Please consult the card catalogue first.
sentences.cn: 请先查找卡片目录。

sentences.c: Please consult the card catalogue or the computer.
sentences.cn: 请查阅卡片目录或计算机。

sentences.c: According to Kramer, Haiti's problem isn't lack of soil fertility, but lack of soil itself.
sentences.cn: 据克雷默说，海地的问题不在于土壤贫瘠，而在于缺少土壤。

sentences.c: According to Kramer, Haiti's problem isn't lack of soil fertility, but lack of soil itself. "Deforestation erodes whole layers of soil into the ocean every year."
sentences.cn: 克雷默表示，海地目前的问题不是缺少肥沃的土地，而是缺少土地，“每年，滥伐森林都把土地的整个土层都冲刷到了海里。”

sentences.c: During recent years, continuous cropping Soybean, lack of soil tillage and lack of effective herbicide for Perennial sowthistle caused Perennial sowthistle rampant.
sentences.cn: 近年来，由于大豆连作普遍、土壤耕作次数减少且无防除苣荬菜的特效药，导致大豆田苣荬菜的危害日趋严重。

sentences.c: For example, if a plant needs protection against a leaf-feeding pest, the protective agent need not also be present in the grain (that's harvested for food).
sentences.cn: 例如，如果一种作物需要保护免于遭受一种以叶子为食物的害虫的侵害，保护剂不需要在（作为粮食而收割的）作物中出现。

sentences.c: Organic standards require management practices that prevent pests, such as removal of pest habitat, food sources, breeding areas, and prevention of access to processing facilities.
sentences.cn: 有机标准要求采取措管理性施防治虫害，如清除害虫栖息地、切断食物来源和破坏繁殖地区，或阻止害虫进入处理设施。

sentences.c: It spread through France, where wild rabbits are not generally regarded as a pest but as a sport and a useful food supply.
sentences.cn: 它蔓延到整个法国，法国一般不把野兔当作有害动物，而把它当作一种取乐的猎物和有用的食物来源。

trans.cn: 环境破坏：指人类活动对自然环境造成的损害，包括污染、破坏生态系统、消耗自然资源等。

sentences.c: Environmental damage threatens the whole of civilization.
sentences.cn: 环境的破坏威胁着整个文明世界。

sentences.c: We view this kind of advertising as environmental damage and will take strong action against it.
sentences.cn: 我们认为这种广告会破坏环境，并将采取有力措施加以制止。

sentences.c: Higher prices, called price premiums, can be justified as a way to compensate farmers for providing ecosystem services and avoiding environmental damage or external costs.
sentences.cn: 更高的价格，亦称为价格溢价，可以作为补偿农民的一种措施，补偿其为提供生态系统服务、避免环境破坏或外部成本带来的损失。

trans.cn: 食物链：生态系统中生物按照捕食顺序排列的一种组织形式，每个生物都以比它更低层次的生物为食物来源。

sentences.c: Insects are fairly low down (on) the food chain.
sentences.cn: 在食物链中，昆虫是相当低的一级生物。

sentences.c: The whole food chain is affected by the overuse of chemicals in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 整个食物链因农业中过度使用化学制品而受到影响。

sentences.c: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.
sentences.cn: 这会对农业和食物链造成威胁，由此而危及人的健康。

sentences.c: It has become the common view of mass medical staff that modern bio-psycho-social medical model guide clinical medical practice.
sentences.cn: 现代生物心理社会医学模式已经成为卫生界领导及广大医务人员的共识，并以此指导临床医疗实践。

sentences.c: A batch of advanced figures carefully to launch a "call light a lamp, lighting a large" demonstration effect, and played a very good role model guide.
sentences.cn: 一批批先进的人物浓墨重彩地推出，产生了“拨亮一盏灯，照亮一大片”的示范效应，起到了很好的引导示范作用。

sentences.c: We could create that solution by hand, using the model as a guide.
sentences.cn: 我们可以将模型作为指南使用以手动创建该方案。

trans.cn: 视频摄像机：一种记录视频和通常包括音频的摄像机，特别是指便携式摄像机。

sentences.c: The machines have many fun characters like a built-in video camera, voice recording, and games.
sentences.cn: 这些机器有许多有趣的部件，比如内置的摄像机、录音和游戏。

sentences.c: You used a video camera to record nearly everything in our life.
sentences.cn: 你用摄像机记录了我们生活中几乎所有的事情。

sentences.c: The video camera that one single mother bought for a special occasion, for example, is not much fun now.
sentences.cn: 例如，一个单身母亲为特殊场合买的摄像机现在就没什么意思了。

trans.cn: 测量设备：用于测量物理量或特定参数的设备，包括但不限于尺子、量杯、计时器、温度计、血压计等。

sentences.c: With my measuring equipment, I checked the sprue and runner.
sentences.cn: 借由我的测定设备，我检查溶碴和转轮。

sentences.c: Objective To design an temperature measuring equipment for clinic medicine.
sentences.cn: 目的研制一种临床使用的体温测量装置。

sentences.c: The application of infrared data communication to power monitoring and measuring equipment is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了应用于电力监测装置的红外线数据通信。

trans.cn: 天赋：指个体在出生时所具备的与生俱来的能力或才能。

sentences.c: Parents must make use of their natural ability to empathize.
sentences.cn: 父母一定要利用他们天生体恤别人的能力。

sentences.c: It's mainly about a natural ability of the special chickens.
sentences.cn: 它主要是关于特殊的鸡的一种天生能力。

sentences.c: She has a natural ability to understand the motives of others.
sentences.cn: 她具备洞察别人动机的天赋。

trans.cn: 不错的努力：表示对某人的尝试或努力表示赞赏，尽管结果可能不尽如人意。

sentences.c: Good effort, could do better.
sentences.cn: 更多努力，可以做得更好。

sentences.c: I thought at the time that the essay was a pretty good effort.
sentences.cn: 那时我觉得文章写得挺不错。

sentences.c: If you make good effort, one day your dream will be coming true.
sentences.cn: 如果你坚持不懈的努力的话，总有一天你的梦想会实现的。

trans.cn: 领导能力：指一个人在组织或团队中展现出的领导才能和技巧，包括激励他人、制定目标、指导团队、决策等方面的能力。

sentences.c: Strong leadership skill while possessing a great team spirit。
sentences.cn: 有很高的领导艺术和很强的集体精神。

sentences.c: Strong leadership skill while possessing a great team spirit.
sentences.cn: 有很强的领导才能并具很强的集体精神。

sentences.c: Strong leadership skill while possessing a great team spirit.
sentences.cn: 有很强的领导能力技巧和集体精神。

trans.cn: 制动系统：一种用于控制车辆减速或停止的系统，通常由制动盘、制动鼓、制动片、制动液等组成。

sentences.c: Consider a vehicle anti-lock braking system (ABS).
sentences.cn: 考虑一下汽车的防抱死系统(abs)。

sentences.c: A snag also emerged with the braking system on its bestselling Prius model.
sentences.cn: 最畅销车型普锐斯的刹车系统也出现了问题。

sentences.c: It offers such features as hands-free telephone dialing and a collision-mitigation braking system.
sentences.cn: 它的额外配置有免提拨号和撞击缓冲刹车系统。

synos.cn: 制动系统；[车辆]刹车系统

trans.cn: 环境问题：涉及环境保护的问题，包括但不限于气候变化、污染、资源消耗、生物多样性丧失等。

sentences.c: She cares deeply about environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 她对环境问题深感担忧。

sentences.c: She usually writes about environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 她通常写环境方面的题材。

sentences.c: She advises the government on environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 她是政府的环境问题顾问。

trans.cn: 变革管理：个人、团队、组织在转变状况或状态时采取的管理措施，帮助相关公司管理者在商业环境中接受、拥抱变化。

sentences.c: The management of change essence is to human's behavior, the thought and the custom change.
sentences.cn: 变革管理的实质是对人的行为、思想和习惯的改变。

sentences.c: Sustainable management of change process to achieve efficient operation, ensuring quality delivery of end to end.
sentences.cn: 持续管理变革，实现高效的流程化运作，确保端到端的优质交付。

sentences.c: Sustainable management of change, the process of achieving efficient operation to ensure that end-to-end delivery of high quality.
sentences.cn: 持续管理变革，实现高效的流程化运作，确保端到端的优质交付。

trans.cn: 财政援助：为帮助支付学费而向学生提供的赠款或贷款。

sentences.c: How many of them give you financial AIDS?
sentences.cn: 他们中有多少给了你财政援助？

sentences.c: Financial AIDS generally taper off after the first year of college.
sentences.cn: 助学金通常在大学一年级之后逐渐减少。

sentences.c: Learn all you need to know about scholarships, grants, and other financial AIDS.
sentences.cn: 学习一切你需要知道的奖学金，助学金和其他经济援助。

trans.cn: 工作风格：指个人或组织在工作中表现出来的特定方式或态度。

sentences.c: What is the working style of creative people?
sentences.cn: 有创造力的人的工作风格是什么？

sentences.c: His steady working style of 35 years made his status high.
sentences.cn: 他35年扎实的工作作风让他的地位很高。

sentences.c: GTD should be adapted to fit your personal working style - it's not a cookie-cutter approach.
sentences.cn: 你应该使GTD适合你个人的工作方式——它不是什么千篇一律的方法。

trans.cn: 迟交：指在规定的截止日期之后提交作业、文件或申请等。

sentences.c: Late submission will not be processed. Late submission will not be processed.
sentences.cn: 截止日期后送交的申请将不获处理。

sentences.c: Nevertheless as an exceptional measure, we have decided to overlook its late submission.
sentences.cn: 然而,作为一项特别措施,我们决定不计较逾期问题。

sentences.c: Should there be any time lag in exiling the printing mistakes or others due to the late submission of picture or ad image by ad clients' we are free from the claims.
sentences.cn: 由于广告客户自身原因，造成图文资料迟交误期，导致没有足够时间验证广告印刷样本或其他印刷错误，本刊概不负责。

trans.cn: 研究不足：指在某个领域或主题上缺乏足够的调查、研究或探索。

sentences.c: But there was still a lack of research funds.
sentences.cn: 但我们仍缺乏研究资金。

sentences.c: However, this is not Marx's fault, but the lack of research we have today caused regret.
sentences.cn: 然而，这并不是马克思的过错，而是我们今天研究的不足而造成的遗憾。

sentences.c: In a sense, the lack of research on the educational the ought is one of the deficiencies in pedagogy.
sentences.cn: 在一定意义上说，教育应然问题研究的欠缺是教育学的病症之一。

trans.cn: 耕作方法：指在农业生产中采用的种植、养殖、管理等方面的技术和方法。

sentences.c: This is the first time I saw such kind of farming method and wondered why.
sentences.cn: 第一次看到这种耕作方式，有点好奇。

sentences.c: Pollution to soil can be reduced by changing farming method and management system.
sentences.cn: 通过改变耕作方法和管理制度，减轻对土壤造成的污染。

sentences.c: For many reasons, then, an increasingly crowded civilization needs an alternative farming method.
sentences.cn: 出于以上原因，人口日益增长的人类文明需要可替代的耕作方法。

trans.cn: 知识分享：将知识传递给他人或组织的过程。

sentences.c: Get some training and knowledge sharing cooking!
sentences.cn: 赶紧多做点培训，多进行知识分享吧。

sentences.c: Clearly, a shift towards knowledge sharing culture was achieved.
sentences.cn: 很显然，向分享知识的文化的转变已经达成。

sentences.c: We hope that such knowledge sharing activities can continue in the future.
sentences.cn: 我们希望将来继续开展这种知识分享活动。

trans.cn: 均一水平：指某个领域或范围内的各个方面都达到了相同的标准或水平。

sentences.c: But in the restaurant world, the style of uniform is largely dependent on the establishment's level of service and cuisine.
sentences.cn: 但是在餐饮业，制服的风格很大程度上取决于服务和烹饪的水平。

sentences.c: The author also argues that four conditions must be met for imposing punitive damage, and advise the legislature not to fix a uniform limit at the national level.
sentences.cn: 分析追究惩罚性赔偿责任的构成要件，主张不宜规定全国统一的惩罚性赔偿标准。

sentences.c: But without any adjustment to glossiness and reflection level our coat will look too uniform and unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 但是对于上面的光泽度和反射层没有做任何调整，以免给人不真实感。

trans.cn: 座位容量：指一个场所或设施能够容纳的座位数量。

sentences.c: The room had a seating capacity of over 200.
sentences.cn: 这个房间能容200多人就座。

sentences.c: The theatre has a seating capacity of 2 000.
sentences.cn: 那座剧院能容纳2 000名观众。

sentences.c: Each stadium had a seating capacity of about 50,000.
sentences.cn: 每个运动场能容纳大约五万座席。

trans.cn: 图片框架：用于装载图片的框架。

sentences.c: Responsible for the repair and maintenance of all ceiling panels, fixed ceilings, wall paneling and picture framing.
sentences.cn: 维修保养所有的天花面，固定吊顶， 墙面上的镶板以及图画的外框。

sentences.c: The ornamental herringbone brickwork was used to create personal expression and to articulate the picture Windows and volumes by using framing, pattern and variety in the laying of the bricks.
sentences.cn: 装饰性的人字砖砌工艺被用以实现个性表达，并通过变幻砖的结构、图案和种类表达彩绘窗与卷。

sentences.c: Framing can be very expen si ve, so if you have a family member or friend that is good with woodwork, you may want to ask them if they can frame your picture for you if you pay for the supplies.
sentences.cn: 帧是非常昂贵，所以如果你有家人或朋友，与木制品好，你可能要问他们是否能帧的图片如果你为你付出的用品。

trans.cn: 包装材料：用于包装物品的材料，如纸箱、泡沫塑料、气泡膜等。

sentences.c: Spartina was transported to Washington State in packing materials for oysters transplanted from the east coast in 1894.
sentences.cn: 1894年，米草属植物夹杂在移迁牡蛎的包装材料中，从东海岸来到了华盛顿州。

sentences.c: The company's shipping manager is proposing that customer orders be packed with newer, more expensive packing materials that virtually eliminate damage during shipping.
sentences.cn: 该公司的货运经理建议，客户的订单应该用更新、更昂贵的包装材料包装，这样几乎可以消除运输过程中的损坏现象。

sentences.c: We need these goods to be packed in special packing materials even though they may cost us more.
sentences.cn: 我们需要用特殊的材料包装货物，尽管它们会花费我们更多钞票。

sentences.c: The story broke on the national stage just in time for the centennial conference of the oldest us civil rights organisation, the national Association for the Advancement of Colored People.
sentences.cn: 发生在国家舞台的这一幕正赶上美国最古老的民权组织，全国有色人种协进会(NAACP)的百年会议。

sentences.c: The two studies, both presented Wednesday at the Gamma Ray Bursts 2010 conference in Annapolis, Md., help clarify the story behind some of the universe's most violent events.
sentences.cn: 以上两项研究在星期三于马里兰州安纳波利斯举行的2010γ射线爆炸会议上都作了发表。 这帮助阐明了宇宙中发生的一些最激烈事件背后的情况。

sentences.c: In the months before the 2013 conference, we worked with him to frame his story-to find the right place to begin, and to develop a succinct and logical arc of events.
sentences.cn: 在2013年大会举办的几个月前，我们和他一起准备提纲，寻找合适的切入点以及简洁且有逻辑性的叙事方式。

trans.cn: 舞台剧：一种在剧场中演出的戏剧形式，通常包括演员的表演、舞台布景、灯光效果等元素。

sentences.c: If you have seen the stage production of the Lion King, you have seen Fagan's dance.
sentences.cn: 要是你看过舞台剧《狮子王》，那么你肯定见识过费根的舞蹈作品。

sentences.c: Mel Ferrer her costar in a stage production of "Ondine" fell in love with her for real marrying her in 1954.
sentences.cn: 奥黛丽·赫本和梅尔·弗尔在话剧《美人鱼》中是搭档，现实世界中也坠入了爱河，于是在1954年结婚了。

sentences.c: Mel Ferrer, her costar in a stage production of "Ondine," fell in love with her for real, marrying her in 1954.
sentences.cn: 奥黛丽·赫本和梅尔·弗尔在话剧《美人鱼》中是搭档，现实世界中也坠入了爱河，于是在1954年结婚了。

trans.cn: 策划会议：一种为了讨论和制定计划、目标或项目的会议。

sentences.c: Finally, the Product Owner prepares for the sprint-planning meeting.
sentences.cn: 最后，产品负责人要针对sprint计划会议做准备工作。

sentences.c: The team holds a sprint Planning meeting at the start of each sprint.
sentences.cn: 在每一个迭代的开始，团队都要举行一次Sprint Planning会议。

sentences.c: An iteration starts with an iteration planning meeting that is a few hours long.
sentences.cn: 迭代也起步于时长为几个小时的迭代计划会议。

trans.cn: 人口迁移：指人口从一个地区或国家迁移到另一个地区或国家的过程。

sentences.c: The population movement historically in China caused by various reasons.
sentences.cn: 我国历史上的人口迁移活动是由多方面原因引起的。

sentences.c: Salt also played an important part in population movement and world exploration.
sentences.cn: 盐在人口流动和世界探险中也起到了重要的作用。

sentences.c: The census distinguished itself from previous studies on population movement in that.
sentences.cn: 这次人口普查不同于以前的人口流动研究是因为。

sentences.c: Literature review, interview method, action research, versus analytical method were applied to my thesis.
sentences.cn: 本文综合运用了文献法、访谈法、行动研究法、对比分析法。

sentences.c: This paper adopts literature analysis method, research method and interview method and other research methods.
sentences.cn: 本文重要采取文献剖析法、查询拜访研讨法和访谈法等研讨办法。

sentences.c: The paper adopts literature method, expert interview method and logical study method to make the theoretical investigation.
sentences.cn: 本课题以文献法、专家访谈法、逻辑学研究法等理论方法进行理论性研究。

sentences.c: The Language School wants me to do a bit of exam preparation, but also quite a lot of work in companies and factories, and a couple of children's classes.
sentences.cn: 语言学校想让我做一些考试准备，但也有很多工作是关于公司和工厂，和有几个孩子的班级。

sentences.c: Language Schools New Zealand offers many kinds of English courses including General English, Exam Preparation, Study & Ski and more.
sentences.cn: 新西兰语言学校提供多种英语课程，包括普通英语、备考英语、学习和滑雪等其他课程。

sentences.c: To concentrate in class and listen more efforts should be made before the exam preparation.
sentences.cn: 上课时要集中精力听讲，考试前更应该努力准备。

trans.cn: 较弱的学生：指在学习方面相对较差的学生。

sentences.c: With the prevailing of communicative language teaching, grammar teaching has been becoming weaker and weaker, which in turn causes students' failing to further English learning.
sentences.cn: 随着交际教学法的盛行，大学英语语法教学日益削弱，直接影响到学生英语学习水平的提高。

sentences.c: Both weaker and stronger vocational college students need many tutor teachers while performing on computer, but the effects are not ideal.
sentences.cn: 对基础较差的大专、高职学生，上机操作需要大量辅导教师，而辅导效果却不太理想。

sentences.c: Male students display weaker orientation in regional value than female do and sophomores are with more apparent professional value orientation than freshmen and juniors.
sentences.cn: 男生在地域价值取向上明显低于女生，二年级护理本科生比一年级和三年级护生职业价值取向更明显。

sentences.c: For those with high achievement needs, typically a minority in any organisation, the existence of external goals is less important because high achievers are already internally motivated.
sentences.cn: 对于那些有高成就需求的，通常是任何组织中的少数人，外部目标的存在就不那么重要了，因为高成就者已经在内部受到了激励。

sentences.c: An equally important starting-point is an understanding of the high-level business service commitments that an organisation makes to external parties [...].
sentences.cn: 一个同等重要的起点是对于一个组织对于外界实体作出的高层次的业务服务承诺的理解[…]。

sentences.c: They are visually detached from the external walls, so that the central living space is optically larger, and allows more freedom for internal routes and organisation.
sentences.cn: 在视觉上，盒子都脱离了外墙，这样中心的起居空间在视觉上就变大了，而且室内的通行路线和空间的组织也更加自由。

trans.cn: 字数限制：指在某些写作任务中规定的最大或最小字数限制。

sentences.c: Do not go over the word limit.
sentences.cn: 不要超过字数限制。

sentences.c: Trim an essay with a 1500 word limit to 1200 words.
sentences.cn: 把一篇1500字的短文精简到1200字。

sentences.c: Papers exceeding this word limit will be returned for revision.
sentences.cn: 超过字数限制的论文将被退回修改。

trans.cn: 网络连接：指通过电信设备和网络服务提供商连接到互联网的过程和状态。

sentences.c: People feel "squeezed" because their rising incomes often don't satisfy their rising wants—for bigger homes, more health care, more education, faster Internet connections.
sentences.cn: 人们感到“拮据”，因为他们不断增加的收入常常不能满足他们不断增长的需求，包括更大的房子，更多的医疗保健，更多的教育，更快的网络连接。

sentences.c: All Internet connections are threadbare.
sentences.cn: 所有的网络联系都是表面的。

sentences.c: Does not require fast Internet connections.
sentences.cn: 不需要快速 Internet 连接。

trans.cn: 专业学习：指为提升职业技能或专业知识而进行的学习活动。

sentences.c: I quite wonder at the old expert's wide range of knowledge, and his professional learning has been of great use to us.
sentences.cn: 我对那位老专家广博的学识感到很惊讶，他的专业知识对我们帮助很大。

sentences.c: Course is given priority to with professional study and Russian: professional learning every week 3-4, Russian 2-8 hours (45 minutes per period).
sentences.cn: 课程以专业学习和俄语为主：专业学习每周3 - 4时，俄语2 - 8课时(每课时45分钟)。

sentences.c: We believe that the University of professional learning is a tool we enter the community, not only after we enter the community can engage in industry.
sentences.cn: 我们认为，大学的专业学习是我们进入社会的一个工具，并不是我们进入社会之后所唯一能从事的行业。

sentences.c: At first, many classes for system were developed in this paper, owing to them, a method to design a chemical process simulation system based on class library was provided.
sentences.cn: 本文首先设计开发了系统水平上的系统类，在此基础上给出了基于类库的化工过程模拟系统的设计方法。

sentences.c: Additionally, the following readings will not be explicitly discussed in class, but are important reference materials for class and simulation purposes.
sentences.cn: 此外，以下读物不会明显讨论，但它们是课程与模拟练习的重要参考资料。

sentences.c: This is a simulation game in hand business class and port Royale relatively similar, but this hand-tour map of the greater need to find their own port!
sentences.cn: 这款手游戏是模拟经营类的和海商王比较相像，不过这款手游的地图比较大，需要自己寻找港口！

trans.cn: 视频录制：通过摄影电视显像管拍摄的电视制作的动态影片，也可以指视频磁带录制。

sentences.c: We've been advising shop owners along there about what kind of video recording equipment they can have put in—we'll then be able to get evidence of any criminal activity on film.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在向那里的店主们建议，他们应该安装什么样的录像设备——这样我们就能在录像中找到任何犯罪活动的证据。

sentences.c: We have viewed the video recording of the incident.
sentences.cn: 我们已观看了该事件的录像。

sentences.c: Section 3 Sound Recording and Video Recording.
sentences.cn: 第四章出版、表演、录音录像、播放第三节录音录像。

trans.cn: 塑料瓶：一种用于装载液体或食品的容器，由塑料制成。

sentences.c: Waterbirds, for example, can choke on plastic bottle rings and get cut by scrap metal.
sentences.cn: 例如，水鸟会被塑料瓶的环噎住，还会被废金属割伤。

sentences.c: Scientists in London have found a possible way to solve the problem of plastic bottle waste.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的科学家门发现了一种解决塑料瓶浪费问题的可行方法。

sentences.c: It would be a good idea to use a plastic bottle, with its top cut off, as a container to grow young plants in.
sentences.cn: 把塑料瓶的顶部剪掉当作种植幼苗的容器是个好主意。

trans.cn: 学生宿舍：大学或大学的学生住宿处。

sentences.c: A freshman adviser lives in each residence hall.
sentences.cn: 每栋学生宿舍楼里住着一位新生指导老师。

sentences.c: Meet outside of your residence hall and wait for further instructions.
sentences.cn: 请在住所外集合，等待进一步指示。

sentences.c: Fire drills will be conducted in your residence hall every semester.
sentences.cn: 每学期在你的宿舍楼都会进行消防演习。

trans.cn: 生命科学：一门科学（如生物学、医学，有时也包括人类学或社会学），涉及到生物体和生命过程。

sentences.c: From this, it has opted to focus on life science and medical research, and recently called for proposals for experiments on muscle wasting, osteoporosis and the immune system.
sentences.cn: 基于此，它选择将重点放在生命科学和医学研究上，并在最近呼吁提出有关肌肉萎缩、骨质疏松症和免疫系统的实验提案。

sentences.c: Twenty-five years ago, life science research was a different ball game.
sentences.cn: 相比25年前，生命科学研究早已今非昔比。

sentences.c: For computer science and life science papers, that figure went up to almost 40 percent.
sentences.cn: 对于计算机科学和生命科学类论文，这个比例高达40%。

trans.cn: 财务规划：指制定和管理个人或组织财务目标的过程，包括评估现有财务状况、制定预算、投资规划等。

sentences.c: A growing number also offer financial planning.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司还提供财务规划。

sentences.c: Most of the book is about straight-up financial planning, though.
sentences.cn: 书中的大部分内容都是简单明了的财务计划。

sentences.c: Financial planning should be one part of your company's business plan.
sentences.cn: 财政计划要成为你公司计划中的一部分。

sentences.c: Somewhere down the mountain, some volunteer doctors were teaching medical skills to village nurses.
sentences.cn: 在山下的某个地方，一些志愿者医生正在向乡村护士传授医疗技能。

sentences.c: He is good at treating (治疗) COVID-19. I am interested in him not only for his medical skills but also his humorous sense.
sentences.cn: 他擅长治疗新冠肺炎。我感兴趣的不仅是他的医术还有他的幽默感。

sentences.c: The doctor who is also a poet and philosopher is a superior doctor, one who can give so much more to his patients than just good medical skills.
sentences.cn: 既是诗人又是哲学家的医生是一位优秀的医生，他能给病人的不仅仅是良好的医疗技能。

trans.cn: 客户关系：企业与其客户在一段时间内相互感受和行为方式，以及这对企业的影响的方式。

sentences.c: Customer relationship management (CRM).
sentences.cn: 客户关系管理(Customer relationship management, CRM)。

sentences.c: Enhance business partner and customer relationship.
sentences.cn: 增强业务伙伴和客户关系。

sentences.c: The specific calculation depends on the nature of the customer relationship.
sentences.cn: 计算和客户关系的本质有关。

trans.cn: 部门负责人：指在组织或机构中负责管理和领导某个部门的人员。

sentences.c: The number of employees other than current department heads who could take on the position of department head is equal to only about half of the expected vacancies.
sentences.cn: 除现有部门主管外，能够担任部门主管职位的员工数量仅相当于预期职位空缺的一半左右。

sentences.c: I guess they must not have your contact information, so they sent it addressed in care of your department head.
sentences.cn: 我想他们一定是没有你的联系方式，所以才在地址处上加上烦转交部门领导。

sentences.c: When one department head started to show up late, leave early, or just skip the meeting altogether, Ciccarelli knew there was a problem.
sentences.cn: 后来，有一个部门的主管开始迟到早退，或者干脆缺席，茨卡瑞利意识到肯定出问题了。

trans.cn: 面试问题：在招聘过程中，面试官向求职者提出的一系列问题，以了解求职者的经验、技能、性格等方面是否符合职位要求。

sentences.c: The Appendix presents the interview questions.
sentences.cn: 附录提供了采访问题。

sentences.c: Great! What would the interview questions be like?
sentences.cn: 不错！都有什么样的问题呢？

sentences.c: An applicant sang all of her answers to interview questions.
sentences.cn: 有一位求职者从头到尾用唱歌的方式来回答面试官的问题。

trans.cn: 身份证：一种用于证明个人身份的官方文件。

sentences.c: New members will be issued with a temporary identity card.
sentences.cn: 新成员将配发临时身份卡。

sentences.c: The system might use a smart identity card, or a digital credential linked to a specific computer and would authenticate users at a range of online services.
sentences.cn: 该系统可能使用智能身份证或连接到特定计算机的数字证书，并在一系列在线服务中认证用户。

sentences.c: He showed his identity card and went in.
sentences.cn: 他把工作证亮了一下就进去了。

etymology.d: 比喻用法。

trans.cn: 着装规范：正式或社交上强制规定的着装标准。

sentences.c: Their tables will be set with the good dishes and silver, and the dress code will be Sunday-best.
sentences.cn: 他们的餐桌上将摆满精美的菜肴和银器，他们也会穿上最好的礼服。

sentences.c: If the company does not have a dress code, remember that it's better to overdress than underdress.
sentences.cn: 如果公司没有着装要求，记住穿得太正式比穿得太暴露更好。

sentences.c: The company has a strict dress code—all male employees are expected to wear suits.
sentences.cn: 公司有严格的着装规定—所有男职员都要穿西服。

trans.cn: 保留回忆：保存珍贵的记忆或经历，以便将来回忆或分享。

sentences.c: Scots preserve strong memories of Margaret Thatcher's era, when coal mines, steelworks and shipyards closed, pushing up unemployment, and an unpopular local poll tax was tested.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰一直清晰地保留着玛格丽特·撒切尔时代的很多记忆，当时煤矿倒闭，钢厂关门，船坞停产，失业率骤增，而且还有很让民众不满的人头税存在。

sentences.c: The participants from Trondheim are also documenting the architecture of the 20th century on the site, to preserve the memories of daily life of the residential neighbourhood that is disappearing.
sentences.cn: 来自特隆赫姆trondheim的参赛者们同时也对遗址及周边区域二十世纪的建筑做了现场记录，以保存这片正在消失的邻里街坊中的日常生活记忆。

sentences.c: I like to create scrapbooks to preserve my most precious memories.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢做剪贴专集，借此把最珍贵的记忆都保留下来。

sentences.c: Some people think that this activity is because the nobility to use this event to show off status and wealth to show superiority.
sentences.cn: 有的人认为这项活动是对的，因为贵族们用这个活动来炫耀地位与财富，展示优越感。

sentences.c: The high price paid for the dog is a sign that the red Tibetan mastiff has become a status symbol in China, replacing jewellery and cars as a way for the super-rich to show off their wealth.
sentences.cn: 这次高价竞犬表明在中国红色藏獒已经取代珠宝名车，成为一种身份的象征，让富人得以炫耀自己的财富。

sentences.c: With the purchase of the growing capabilities of successful professionals to show off their status had been looking for a different way of life.
sentences.cn: 随着购买能力的不断增强，成功的专业人士为炫耀其地位开始寻求不同的生活方式。

sentences.c: In the Olympic games Australia usually ranks high in the medal tables, especially if they reflect size of population. Yet tastes evolve, in sport as in any other sphere.
sentences.cn: 在奥赛中，澳洲经常在奖牌排行榜中居高位，尤其是当他们反映出投入体育运动和任何其他活动的人口规模，即使喜好会演变。

sentences.c: Groups like the Raelians reflect the tastes of Inquirer readers and in turn provide many a thrilling headline for us all as we stand in line waiting to pay for our groceries.
sentences.cn: 而像拉耶尔教徒这样的群体，则反映了该报读者的趣味，反过来也为我们在排队等着付款时提供了很多相当刺激的新闻标题。

sentences.c: It is debatable whether the tastes of Kings reflect those of their subjects.
sentences.cn: 英王的爱好是否反映了臣民的爱好是个值得争议的问题。

trans.cn: 个人身份：个人身份是指个人的持久和连续的统一，通常通过与当前意识的记忆连续性来证明。

sentences.c: He meant that we gain personal identity as we communicate with others.
sentences.cn: 他的意思是我们在与他人交流的过程中获得了个人的身份。

sentences.c: What's the nature of personal identity?
sentences.cn: 个人的同一性的本质是什么？

sentences.c: PERSONAL identity is a tightly policed business.
sentences.cn: 个人身份是很严格的警政业务。

synos.cn: 个人统合，[劳经]个人身份；人格同一性

trans.cn: 当地社区：指生活在同一地区的互动人群，通常是在社会单位大于家庭的范围内组织在共同价值观周围的群体。

sentences.c: The local community was shocked by the murders.
sentences.cn: 当地社会对这些谋杀案感到震惊。

sentences.c: The development was bitterly opposed by the local community.
sentences.cn: 这一开发项目遭到了当地社区的愤怒抵制。

sentences.c: Our newspaper aims to reflect the views of the local community.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸旨在表达当地人民的心声。

trans.cn: 仓储仓库：用于存储货物和物品的大型建筑或设施。

sentences.c: In Pompano, Florida, lost dogs and cats were found in large storage warehouse used by dogfight "trainers."
sentences.cn: 在佛罗里达的Pompano，遗失了狗儿和猫咪在一个用来训练斗狗的大储藏仓库中被发现。

sentences.c: The lining of coking, coal, electrical system in the coal unloading tank, coal hoppers, storage warehouse and so on...
sentences.cn: 焦化、煤炭，电气系统中的卸煤槽，煤料斗，贮仓等内衬。

sentences.c: Witnesses reported that the bodies of the three men were removed overnight from the meat storage warehouse in Misrata where they had been on display.
sentences.cn: 见证者称，三个人的尸体于夜间从位于米苏拉塔的始终进行展览的肉铺冷藏间被搬走。

trans.cn: 社会信息：指与社会相关的信息，包括政治、经济、文化、教育等方面的内容。

sentences.c: Cliqset; Merging, Organizing and Sharing Social Information.
sentences.cn: Cliqset；合并、组织、分享社交信息。

sentences.c: Adding Metadata Over Time: Communities Building Social information.
sentences.cn: 随时间而添加的元数据：由社群建设的群体信息。

sentences.c: If confirmed by future studies, the results would indicate that infants are sensitive to social information and to what others see.
sentences.cn: 如果结果能被未来的实验确定，这表明婴儿对社会信息和他们所看见的是很敏感的。

trans.cn: 创意点子：指独特、新颖、富有创造性的想法或构思。

sentences.c: He uses creative ideas to improve city life.
sentences.cn: 他用创造性的想法来改善城市生活。

sentences.c: Creative ideas not only produce their own instruments of survival as time and circumstances demand, but permit the substitution of new forms for old under the pressure of changed circumstances.
sentences.cn: 创造性的思想不仅随着时间和环境的需要产生自己的生存工具，而且允许在已变化环境的压力下用新的形式代替旧的形式。

sentences.c: We use our imagination and come up with creative ideas.
sentences.cn: 我们运用我们的想象力，得出创造性的想法。

trans.cn: 生活费用：指一个人或家庭在日常生活中所需的开支，包括食物、住房、交通、医疗等方面的费用。

sentences.c: When father lost his job, our living expenses had to be cut to the bone.
sentences.cn: 父亲失业后， 我们不得不把生活费用减低到最低限度。

sentences.c: Tokyo and Singapore are both attractive, but the living expenses there are incredibly high.
sentences.cn: 东京和新加坡都很有吸引力，但是那里的生活费用高得令人难以置信。

sentences.c: That includes twelve months of living expenses estimated at twenty thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 这包括12个月的生活费，估计为2万美元。

trans.cn: 调查方法：用于收集数据和信息的一系列技术和程序，通常用于研究、评估或了解某个特定领域或问题。

sentences.c: To find their sites, archaeologists today rely heavily on systematic survey methods and a variety of high-technology tools and techniques.
sentences.cn: 为了找到他们的遗址，考古学家现在非常依赖系统的调查方法以及各种高科技工具和技术。

sentences.c: Methods: Uses trace survey methods.
sentences.cn: 方法：采用线索调查的方法。

sentences.c: And we have made good use of the more standard secondary database, interview, case, and survey methods.
sentences.cn: 我们已经良好地运用了更多的标准二级数据库、采访、案例和调查问卷方法。

trans.cn: 永久记录：指一个人在学校、工作或其他组织中的长期记录，通常包括成绩、表现和行为等方面的信息。

sentences.c: Incorporation of historical and real-time data on vital signs into permanent medical records.
sentences.cn: 将实时生命体征与历史记录融合成永久性的医疗数据。

sentences.c: Koch Chemical promoted her to a permanent position after her trial period expired in mid-2008, court records show.
sentences.cn: 法庭记录显示，在她2008年中试用期到期后，科赫化工提升她到了一个固定职位。

sentences.c: Administration: Records shall be maintained for all vehicles entering the construction site without (permanent) vehicle entry permit.
sentences.cn: 日常管理：对于那些不必使用(永久性)通行证进入现场的各种车辆，必须保存好它们的有关记录。

trans.cn: 选修课：指在学校中，学生可以根据自己的兴趣和需要自由选择的课程，通常不是必修课程。

sentences.c: Is that optional course as hard as everybody says?
sentences.cn: 那门选修课真像大家说的那么难吗？

sentences.c: You took an optional course this semester, didn't you?
sentences.cn: 你这学期选了一门选修课，是吗？

sentences.c: By setting Peking Opera as an optional course, students may have more freedom to decide whether to take it or not.
sentences.cn: 通过将京剧设置为选修课，学生们可以有更多的自由决定是否选修京剧。

sentences.c: Sometimes, they will come in to collect water to drink from the drinking machine.
sentences.cn: 有时，他们会进来从饮水机里接水喝。

sentences.c: The invention relates to an instant drinking machine with electronic refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 本发明涉及一种带电子制冷的直饮机。

sentences.c: The device is mainly applied in the instant heating drinking machine, to heat the water flows inside.
sentences.cn: 该装置主要应用于即热式饮水机中，加热从其中流过的饮用水。

trans.cn: 提款机：一种人们通过使用特殊卡片从银行账户中取款的机器。

sentences.c: For two weeks, the cash machine spewed out receipts apologizing for its inability to dispense money.
sentences.cn: 两周了，自动取款机就输出了一些因其无法提款而致歉的凭条。

sentences.c: You'll only realize when you later go to a cash machine to withdraw some money, then discover that every penny in your account has been cleared out.
sentences.cn: 只有在之后你去取款机取钱时，你才会意识到，你账户里的每一分钱都被清空了。

sentences.c: Barca is also a cash machine.
sentences.cn: 巴萨也是一架造钱机器。

synos.cn: 自动提款机，自动柜员机

trans.cn: 洗衣服务：提供专业洗衣和熨烫等服务的商业机构或个人。

sentences.c: The hotel has a laundry service.
sentences.cn: 旅馆提供洗衣服务。

sentences.c: We have express laundry service.
sentences.cn: 我们有快速洗衣服务。

sentences.c: How should I arrange laundry service?
sentences.cn: 该怎样安排洗衣服务呢？

sentences.c: You should not photocopy it, show it to another person without approval from the editorial office, or discuss your evaluation and recommendations with the author or any other person.
sentences.cn: 不得复印，未经编辑部同意，不得向他人展示，不得就评价和建议与作者或他人进行讨论。

trans.cn: 自主学习实验室：一种供学生自主学习和实践的场所，通常配备有各种学习资源和设备。
电子目录：一种以电子形式存储和检索信息的目录，通常用于查找联系人、地址、电话号码等信息。

sentences.c: You may set up either a file or an electronic directory on each club, adding information as you have contact with the club or receive club bulletins.
sentences.cn: 您可以每个扶轮社建立一个档案或是一个电子目录，然后将您与扶轮社联络的纪录或是收到的社刊继续归档。

sentences.c: Run the setup program from either the directory to which you uncompressed the electronic software distribution, or from the installation CD.
sentences.cn: 从您解压电子软件分布系统的目录或安装 CD 中运行安装程序。

sentences.c: Run the installer program setupwin32.exe from either the directory to which you uncompressed the electronic software distribution, or from the installation CD.
sentences.cn: 从您解压电子软件分布系统的目录或安装CD中运行安装程序setupwin 32 . exe。

trans.cn: 文本结构：指文本的组织和布局方式，包括段落、标题、标点符号等元素的使用，以及文本的逻辑顺序和组织结构。

sentences.c: English Reading; Text Structure Model; Teaching Mode; Construct; Significance.
sentences.cn: 英语阅读；篇章结构模式；教学模式；构建；意义。

sentences.c: The effects of text structure and time stress on web reading performance were examined.
sentences.cn: 探讨了文本结构和时间应激对网页阅读绩效的影响效应。

sentences.c: This research studied the transfer of problem-solving effected by text structure factor.
sentences.cn: 探讨阅读过程中文章结构因素对问题解决迁移效果的影响。

sentences.c: WHEN the Sloan Digital Sky Survey started work in 2000, its telescope in New Mexico collected more data in its first few weeks than had been amassed in the entire history of astronomy.
sentences.cn: 自从斯隆数字巡天于2000年开始工作，头几个星期它在新墨西哥州的望远镜收集到的数据量就超过了整个天文学历史的积累数据量。

sentences.c: This part's chapters contain a massive amount of information, reflecting the many aspects of digital security, and discussing the history as well as popular misconceptions for each technology.
sentences.cn: 本部分的章节包含大量信息，反映了数字安全的许多方面，并且对于每一个技术都讨论了其历史和普遍的误解。

sentences.c: Yet those kinds of numbers have remained elusive throughout the history of digital music.
sentences.cn: 然而这样的数据在数码音乐的历史上仍让人难以捉摸。

trans.cn: 媒体研究：一门学术学科，研究各种媒体，特别是大众媒体的内容、历史、意义和影响。

sentences.c: MIT Comparative Media Studies offers both undergraduate degree opportunities and a two-year course of study leading to an SM degree.
sentences.cn: 麻省理工学院比较媒介研究提供了获得本科学位的机会，同时经过两年学习可以得到理科硕士的学位。

sentences.c: At the University of Michigan, she studied English and global media studies, wrote TV reviews for the student paper and short stories for fun.
sentences.cn: 在密歇根大学，她攻读英语和全球媒体研究，以为学生报纸写作电视剧评论和短篇小说为乐。

sentences.c: MIT Comparative Media Studies offers both undergraduate degree opportunities, as well as a two-year course of study leading to an SM degree.
sentences.cn: 麻省理工学院比较媒介研究提供了获得本科学位的机会，同时经过两年学习可以得到理科硕士的学位。

trans.cn: 自然资源：由自然界提供的工业材料和能力，例如矿藏和水力等。

sentences.c: Angola was a country rich in natural resources.
sentences.cn: 安哥拉是个天然资源丰富的国家。

sentences.c: Industries should be more careful with natural resources.
sentences.cn: 各行业对自然资源应该更加精打细算。

sentences.c: Natural resources should be handed on to the next generation intact.
sentences.cn: 自然资源应该完好无损地传给下一代。

trans.cn: 环境项目：一种旨在保护、改善或恢复环境质量的项目，通常涉及污染防治、生态保护和可持续发展等方面。

sentences.c: Environmental projects generally have biggish uncertainty, and are always influenced greatly by the policy.
sentences.cn: 环境项目评估一般都具有较大的不确定性，受政策面影响较大。

sentences.c: The possibilities for environmental projects are too numerous to cover adequately in the context of this handbook.
sentences.cn: 环境项目的可能性很多，本手册无法一一列举。

sentences.c: It will also inspire them to initiate and implement community environmental projects in their school and community.
sentences.cn: 这也将激励他们在学校和社区发起和实施社区环境项目。

trans.cn: 全球访问：指在世界范围内可以访问或使用某种资源、服务或设施的能力。

sentences.c: Regus is the global access to specific types of valves, we offer to our customers worldwide.
sentences.cn: 雷格斯是全球访问特定类型的阀门方面，我们提供给我们的全球客户。

sentences.c: The Internet is a rapid, mass media tool that allows global access to millions of people almost instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 互联网是一个快速而庞大的媒体，全球几百万人可以在一瞬间就都接入互联网。

sentences.c: The Global Access Program at the Anderson School provides a good illustration of the new types of offerings.
sentences.cn: 安德森商学院的全球培训课程是个很好的尝试。

sentences.c: Did you solve the one you heard for the listening task?
sentences.cn: 你解决一个你听到的听力任务吗？

sentences.c: Step 3 Reading & Listening Task 1: Ask the students to read the first diary entry after the tape, and find out the route of their trip.
sentences.cn: 通过听录音朗读课文，找出旅行路线，对文章进行进一步的理解。

sentences.c: By approaching each listening task as a step-by-step process, you can help students be more relaxed and successful in listening to English.
sentences.cn: 我的学生在完成书上的任务时有很多问题，我怎样才能帮助他们呢？

sentences.c: The book is currently on loan.
sentences.cn: 该书已借出。

sentences.c: The book you wanted is out on loan.
sentences.cn: 你要的那本书借出去了。

sentences.c: The days of building up a big loan book without bothering about deposits or branches may be over.
sentences.cn: 账簿上记载着大量借款，且对存款和分行漠不关心的日子或许结束了。

trans.cn: 必修课：指在学校或大学中规定必须修读的课程，学生必须参加并取得相应的学分。

sentences.c: There is a compulsory course in statistics.
sentences.cn: 有一门统计学的必修课。

sentences.c: It is a compulsory course in most schools.
sentences.cn: 在大部分学校英语都是必修课。

sentences.c: It is an important compulsory course for all economics related majors.
sentences.cn: 它是所有经济学相关专业的重要必修课程。

sentences.c: Full-time study form, system for three years.
sentences.cn: 全日制学习形式，学制三年。

sentences.c: A master's degree generally takes 2 to 3 years of full-time study.
sentences.cn: 取得硕士学位通常要花2 - 3年的全日制学习。

sentences.c: A master's degree generally takes two to three years of full-time study.
sentences.cn: 一个硕士学位通常需要两至三年的全日制学习。

sentences.c: In a UUK report, he said the number of flexible courses - including part-time study, on-the-job training and internet-based qualifications - would "explode" in the future.
sentences.cn: 在英国大学联合会发布的一份报告中，他提到，非全日制课程、在职培训和网络函授等弹性课程的数量将在未来猛增。

sentences.c: However, if so, this activity will entirely nun the interests of language learning for kids. which shift their flexible foreign language interests into the forced and test-oriented study all the time.
sentences.cn: 它又将灵活的外语学习兴趣变成了整个中学阶段压迫式的应试教育。

trans.cn: 活火山：在过去的10000年内曾经喷发过的火山，尽管现在不一定会喷发岩浆或气体。

sentences.c: An active volcano may erupt at any time.
sentences.cn: 活火山会随时喷发。

sentences.c: Located in southern Italy, Etna is the highest active volcano in Europe.
sentences.cn: 埃特纳火山位于意大利南部，是欧洲最高的活火山。

sentences.c: Doing that in many of the forests of the western US is like building homes on the side of an active volcano.
sentences.cn: 在美国西部的许多森林里那样做就像在活火山边上建房子一样。

trans.cn: 死火山：指已经停止喷发并且不再具有活动迹象的火山。

sentences.c: An extinct volcano can no longer erupt.
sentences.cn: 一个灭绝的火山已不能再爆发。

sentences.c: I picnic by an extinct volcano every week.
sentences.cn: 我每周在一座死火山旁野餐。

sentences.c: An extinct volcano has ceased to be able to explode.
sentences.cn: 死火山已失去爆发能力。

trans.cn: 清洁产品：用于清洁的各种产品，包括表面活性剂、螯合剂、溶剂、增溶剂、聚合物化合物、防腐剂、皮肤保护剂等。

sentences.c: The twins endorsed a line of household cleaning products.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎为一系列的家庭清洁产品代言过。

sentences.c: When we mention cleaning products, we have to talk about paper towels.
sentences.cn: 当我们提及清洁产品时，我们必须谈到纸巾。

sentences.c: Women sell home-made cleaning products from shacks.
sentences.cn: 妇女们兜售各种从棚户里制造出的清洁产品。

trans.cn: 定位测试：一种通常给进入教育机构的学生进行的测试，以确定他们在各个学科中的具体知识或熟练程度，以便将其分配到适当的课程或班级。

sentences.c: Will you be able to come in on Friday for an interview and placement test?
sentences.cn: 你可以在星期五来面试和参加一个分级试吗？

sentences.c: What do you think of the oral test on computer during the English placement test?
sentences.cn: 你如何看待英语分级考试中口语采用机试？

sentences.c: Do a quick test, such as the quick Placement test produced by Oxford University press?
sentences.cn: 做个快速测验，例如牛津大学出版社出版的QUICK PLACEMENT TEST(快速编班测试)。

trans.cn: 公司场所：指公司所在的建筑物、土地或其他财产。

sentences.c: Business rates, paid on shop and company premises, can be just as hard to handle in a downturn.
sentences.cn: 对商店和公司房产支付的营业财产税，在经济下滑时期难以处理。

sentences.c: Paul, the boss, mistakenly thinks Anna's been smoking on company premises and she's trying to explain herself.
sentences.cn: 老板保罗误以为安娜在公司吸烟，她正试着为自己解释。

sentences.c: Any persons who carry out work on the company premises in performance of the contract must observe the applicable company regulations.
sentences.cn: 在公司场所为履行合同而进行工作的任何人必须遵守相应的公司规章。

trans.cn: 休闲活动：指人们在业余时间进行的、不涉及工作或学习的各种娱乐、文化、体育等活动。

sentences.c: With the time spent eating, sleeping, and taking care of household duties, there's little time left for leisure activities for many Americans.
sentences.cn: 由于吃饭、睡觉和料理家务，许多美国人几乎没有时间参加休闲活动。

sentences.c: We've invited all of you taking evening classes and leisure activities to come and see the changes we've made to the Centre in the last month.
sentences.cn: 我们邀请所有参加夜校和休闲活动的人来看看我们上个月对中心的改造。

sentences.c: With the time spent eating, sleeping and taking care of the household duties, there's little time left for leisure activities for many Americans.
sentences.cn: 由于吃饭、睡觉和料理家务，许多美国人几乎没有时间参加休闲活动。

sentences.c: ROBERT E. HUNTER is a Senior Adviser at the RAND Corporation.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特 E.亨特尔是兰德公司的一名高级顾问。

sentences.c: The firm has Jeff Sutherland on staff serving as a Senior Adviser.
sentences.cn: Jeff Sutherland作为高级顾问，是该公司的职员。

sentences.c: Li, senior adviser of the company, controls about 70% of the carrier.
sentences.cn: 李泽源目前是深航高级顾问，持有其近70%的股份。

trans.cn: 视觉辅助工具：指用于增强沟通的任何视觉材料或工具，如图表、图示、照片、视频或幻灯片。

sentences.c: He also prepared visual aids, diagramming photo line, so his classmates wouldn't get confused.
sentences.cn: 他还准备了视觉教具，绘制了照片线，这样他的同学就不会被弄糊涂了。

sentences.c: Then they try to teach the students something with a specific presentation style, like using visual AIDS, and do a follow up test to see how much they learned.
sentences.cn: 然后他们试着用一种特定的演讲风格教学生一些东西，比如使用视觉辅助，和做一个后续测试，看看他们学到了多少。

sentences.c: Use visual AIDS.
sentences.cn: 运用视觉教具。

trans.cn: 化石遗迹：指古生物遗体或遗迹在地质年代中经过长时间的地质作用而形成的矿化遗物。

sentences.c: In the 1920s, a paleontologist discovered the fossil remains of a small dinosaur near a nest containing eggs.
sentences.cn: 20世纪20年代，一位古生物学家在一个装着蛋的巢穴附近发现了一只小恐龙的化石遗迹。

sentences.c: The fossil remains of the first flying vertebrates, the pterosaurs, have intrigued paleontologists for more than two centuries.
sentences.cn: 翼龙是第一批会飞的脊椎动物，它的化石遗迹已经吸引了古生物学家两个多世纪。

sentences.c: At older lake sites, there's fossil remains from hippopotamuses, water buffalo, animals that spend much of their lives standing in water, and also, fossils of cattle.
sentences.cn: 在较老的湖泊遗址，有河马、水牛的化石遗迹，这些动物一生中大部分时间都站在水里，还有牛的化石。

trans.cn: 人类干预：指人类对自然环境、动植物等的干预和影响。

sentences.c: If you think about it though, the core problem with this sixth mass extinction is human interference.
sentences.cn: 如果你仔细想想，这第六次大灭绝的核心问题是人类的干扰。

sentences.c: Of course, like every other environmental issue today, this is playing out against the background of global warming and human interference with natural ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 当然，就像今天的其他环境问题一样，这是在全球变暖和人类干涉自然生态系统的背景下发生的。

sentences.c: Ocean ecosystems are in a lot of trouble and it all bears the hallmarks of human interference.
sentences.cn: 现在海洋生态系统有许多问题，而所有这些问题都有人为干扰的特点。

trans.cn: 咖啡吧：一个提供咖啡和通常还有轻食的场所或柜台。

sentences.c: B Thank you. And the Coffee Bar?
sentences.cn: b谢谢你。那咖啡厅呢？

sentences.c: Maybe a vending machine, or humble little coffee bar?
sentences.cn: 也许是一个售卖机，或者是小型的咖啡馆？

sentences.c: Just like Starbucks, each coffee bar would have its own barista, the person who makes and serves the drinks.
sentences.cn: 就像星巴克一样，每个咖啡吧都会有自己的服务生(Barista)，这位服务生为顾客制作咖啡和提供服务。

sentences.c: Our top-notch creative team is at hand to provide creative and professional consulting services, ranging from shop display design to large-scale event planning.
sentences.cn: 从商业空间陈列设计到大型会展规划，我们顶尖的创意团队为客户提供最具创意和专业的设计咨询服务。

sentences.c: We can supply you with a variety of display hook, wire hook, hook, metal hook, pegboard hook, grid wall hook, supermarket hook, shop display hook, cloth hook in different sizes and styles.
sentences.cn: 我公司长期生产和供应各类超市、商店和仓储挂钩、款式多样、价格从优，也可以按照您的要求定做。

sentences.c: Her attention was engaged by the display of the new dress in the shop windows.
sentences.cn: 她被商店橱窗里陈列的新裙子所吸引。

trans.cn: 个人服务；劳务；直接送达

sentences.c: The hotel offers a friendly atmosphere and personal service.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆服务周到，使客人感到宾至如归。

sentences.c: You can't really get a robot to do a great massage or physical therapy, or you can't get the kind of personal attention you need with regard to therapy or any other personal service.
sentences.cn: 你不可能真的让一个机器人去做一个很棒的按摩或者物理治疗，或者你不可能得到在做治疗或其他个人服务时你需要的那种个性化关怀。

sentences.c: That is, you can't really get a robot to do a great massage or physical therapy, or you can't get the kind of personal attention you need with regard to therapy or any other personal service.
sentences.cn: 也就是说，你不能让机器人做按摩或物理治疗，或者你不能得到治疗或其他个人服务所需的个人关注。

trans.cn: 当前研究：指正在进行的研究项目或课题。

sentences.c: Unlike the current study, Mar's study did not test people after having them read different types of fiction.
sentences.cn: 与目前的研究不同，Mar 的研究并没有让人们阅读不同类型的小说后对他们进行测试。

sentences.c: The current study was designed to investigate MRI differential diagnosis and clinical value of lymphoadiopathies in the retrocrural space.
sentences.cn: 当前的研究旨在调查 MRI 鉴别诊断和后路间隙淋巴性病变的临床价值。

sentences.c: The women reported no change in mood in the current study.
sentences.cn: 据报告当前研究中的妇女未出现情绪变化。

trans.cn: 视频营销：一种通过制作和分享视频来推广产品或服务的营销策略。

sentences.c: With this approach, and with tips from the still-image Mosaic article in Resources, you can create video Mosaic images of the text of your choosing.
sentences.cn: 利用本文介绍的方法和参考资料中关于静态图像马赛克的文章，您可以自选文本创作您自己的视频马赛克图像。

sentences.c: Buy ready-made plans, take online classes, check out software or video lessons, use an "unschooling" approach that teaches through real-life activities or incorporate a mix of all of these.
sentences.cn: 可以购买一些现成的课程计划、网络课程、软件或音像制品，也可以使用“非校园化的”方式，例如现实活动或将以上方法集中起来。

sentences.c: A P2P approach for video streaming would be to hold a copy of a file in different parts of the world and serve it from multiple points to users.
sentences.cn: P 2 P架构下流媒体视频是在世界各地的用户那里都放上文件的一个拷贝然后在用户索取的时候通过多点提供给用户。

sentences.c: Education now offers the lower classes access to job opportunities.
sentences.cn: 现在的教育为下层社会提供了工作机会。

sentences.c: Speaking Chinese means more job opportunities.
sentences.cn: 会说中文意味着更多的就业机会。

sentences.c: This is often due to the availability of better job opportunities and education.
sentences.cn: 这通常是由于有更好的工作机会和教育。

trans.cn: 更高的费用：指比原来更高的价格或费用。

sentences.c: The main grievance of the drivers is the imposition of higher fees for driving licences.
sentences.cn: 司机们的主要不满是加诸在驾驶执照上的更高的费用。

sentences.c: Part of its profits reflect the higher fees its bigger market share allows.
sentences.cn: 高盛的部分利润反映了其更大的市场份额所获得的收益也更高。

sentences.c: Banks will seek to pass costs on to customers in higher fees and spreads on loans.
sentences.cn: 银行会试图通过提高费用和贷款利差将成本转嫁到客户身上。

trans.cn: 借用语：指一种语言中借用了另一种语言的词汇或语法结构的现象。

sentences.c: Maybe it happened by chance, maybe one language was heavily influenced by borrowed words from the other.
sentences.cn: 也许这是偶然发生的，也许是一种语言深受另一种语言的借用词影响。

sentences.c: Throughout much of history, the English language has borrowed words from other languages to become the intermixed language that we know today.
sentences.cn: 纵览历史，英语借用了很多舶来词，演变成了今天我们所熟悉的“大杂烩”语言。

sentences.c: The language from which a word is borrowed may also be referred to as the source language of the loanword.
sentences.cn: 这种借用外来词的语言对于被借用的语言来说也是源语言。

sentences.c: "The moratorium was designed as a confidence building measure to get the talks going," said Regev.
sentences.cn: 他说：“暂缓令是一种树立互信的手段，使谈判能够开始进行。”

sentences.c: Like anyone in the early stages of running their own business, I too needed some confidence building, reassurance and praise.
sentences.cn: 和其他才开始经营个人企业的人相似，我也需要建立信心、消除疑虑并得到赞扬。

sentences.c: If the deal comes off, it could yet prove one small confidence-building step in the much bigger row over Iran's ultimate nuclear ambitions.
sentences.cn: 假若成功达成协议，可能总有一天会证明在对于伊朗终极核子野心的更大争议上，踏出建立信任的一小步。

trans.cn: 数理能力：指个体在日常生活和工作中处理数学问题的能力，包括计算、估算、理解数学概念等。
社交机会：指在社交场合中结交新朋友、建立人脉关系的机会。

sentences.c: Business Partner Showcase and a multitude of networking opportunities.
sentences.cn: 商业合伙人展示(Business Partner Showcase)和许多沟通的机会。

sentences.c: You hear about fantastic networking opportunities second- or thirdhand.
sentences.cn: 你会辗转听到拓展人脉关系的美妙机会。

sentences.c: Just goes to show that networking opportunities like this can pay off in spades.
sentences.cn: 这证明这样的联网机会肯定可以获得丰厚的回报。

trans.cn: 研究方法：通过特定的方式研究某个事物，以便发现关于它的新信息或更好地理解它。

sentences.c: A good research method, a good way to learn more, is by running a banding study.
sentences.cn: 电子条带捆绑研究是一个很好的研究方法，也是对蜂鸟作进一步了解的一种很好的方式。

sentences.c: The main research method in this study was action research.
sentences.cn: 论文采用的主要的研究方法是行动研究法。

sentences.c: The second part introduces the research method and its application.
sentences.cn: 第二部分介绍了研究方法及其运用。

trans.cn: 音频录音：使用录音设备或软件记录声音的过程。

sentences.c: But what if you want to improve the quality of your audio recording while taking video?
sentences.cn: 但如果你想要在拍摄视频时让录音质量更好呢？

sentences.c: In 2006, a computer analysis of the audio recording found evidence that Armstrong did say the missing "a."
sentences.cn: 在2006年，对这份录音所做的电脑分析发现，阿姆斯壮确实说过那漏失的“一个”。

sentences.c: Some were given the words at night (played via an audio recording), then required to stay awake until morning in the lab.
sentences.cn: 一些志愿者通过音频录音在夜间接受单词，然后他们必须一直保持清醒状态直到早上来实验室接受测试。

trans.cn: 参与不足：指在某个活动、项目或组织中，人们的参与程度不够，缺乏积极性和热情。

sentences.c: In the survey, 71% of participants cited a lack of participation by others as a problem with virtual meetings.
sentences.cn: 在这次调查中，71%的受访者将其他人缺少参与视为虚拟会议存在的一个问题。

sentences.c: Their lack of participation has been one stumbling block to attempts to hammer out a successor agreement to the Kyoto Protocol, which expires in 2012.
sentences.cn: 它们的缺位一直是敲定京都议定书后续协议的绊脚石。 京都议定书将在2012年到期。

sentences.c: Women may suffer isolation, inability to work, loss of wages, lack of participation in regular activities and limited ability to care for themselves and their children.
sentences.cn: 妇女会有孤立感、无力工作、失去工资、缺乏正常活动的参与以及照顾自己和子女的能力受到限制。

sentences.c: In addition, the small group online structure captures the names of the participants and artifacts for permanent reference by the broader community.
sentences.cn: 此外，小规模团队在线结构还可以获取参与者的姓名以及广泛团体永久参考的文章。

sentences.c: The four information types (topic, concept, task, and reference) represent the primary content categories used in the technical documentation community.
sentences.cn: 这四种信息类型(主题、概念、任务和引用)代表了技术文档团体中使用的基本内容类型。

sentences.c: This open source community is developing a reference implementation for the OpenSocial specification and deployment in this environment.
sentences.cn: 这个开源社区正在开发针对此种环境下的OpenSocial规范和部署的一种参考实现。

trans.cn: 议会会议：由议会成员参加的会议，用于讨论和决定政府事务和政策。

sentences.c: Similarly mistaken was the emergency UN Security Council meeting.
sentences.cn: 联合国安理会的紧急会议也犯了相似的错误。

sentences.c: A UN Security Council meeting in New York this week will decide whether to offer additional funds.
sentences.cn: 本周在纽约召开的一个联合国安理会会议将会决定是否要为其提供额外的资助。

sentences.c: Will the Chinese delegation propose any specific measures at the present Security Council meeting?
sentences.cn: 目前安理会正就此召开会议，中方代表团是否将在会议中提出具体措施？

trans.cn: 可再生能源：从可再生资源中收集的能源，如风能、水能或太阳能，通常用于电力生产。

sentences.c: He has carried out extensive research into renewable energy sources.
sentences.cn: 他已经对再生能源进行了广泛研究。

sentences.c: The success of wind power represents a litmus test for renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 风能利用的成功是对可再生能源的一次立见分晓的检验。

sentences.c: Renewable energy will become progressively more important as time goes on.
sentences.cn: 随着时间的推移，可再生能源将逐渐变得更重要。

trans.cn: 核电站：一种利用核能产生电力的设施，通过核裂变或核聚变反应来产生热能，进而驱动发电机产生电能。

sentences.c: Uranium is used to fuel nuclear plants.
sentences.cn: 铀用作核电厂的燃料。

sentences.c: Today opponents have so complicated its development that no nuclear plants have been ordered or built here in 12 years.
sentences.cn: 如今，反对者已经将发展复杂化，以至于12年来，这里没有订购或建造任何核电站。

sentences.c: No one dared to suggest building new nuclear plants.
sentences.cn: 没有人敢提议兴建新的核电站。

trans.cn: 传统资源：指传统社会、文化中所拥有的可利用的资源。

sentences.c: As a new tourism form, the theme parks play an increasingly important role in the tourism industry to break the traditional resource-oriented development model.
sentences.cn: 主题公园作为一种新兴的旅游业态，有效突破了以资源为导向的传统旅游开发模式，在旅游产业链中扮演着越来越重要的角色。

sentences.c: Traditional resource sharing systems, such as MOSIX, expect to lay on top of a fast and static communication channel, and cannot function on top of a volatile and slow wireless links.
sentences.cn: 传统的资源共享系统，比如MOSIX，期望建立在快速和静止的通信信道之上，并且不能在不稳定和慢速的无线链路下工作。

sentences.c: In second chapter, I analyzed simply and dealed with the corresponding classification to the enterprise resource flexibility according to the traditional resource classification methods.
sentences.cn: 在第二章里，本文依据传统的资源分类方式对企业柔性资源做了简单分析和相应的分类处理。

sentences.c: Give when new kitchen small electric equipment acquiring in the home, the product ornament that can choose a few red designedly is on work station, make the red in eat hutch space coherent rise.
sentences.cn: 给家里添置新的厨房小电器时，可以特意挑选一些红色的产品点缀在操作台上，使餐厨空间里的红色连贯起来。

sentences.c: DHK Electric Chain Hoist is a small light lifting equipment.
sentences.cn: DHK环链电动葫芦是一种轻小型起重设备。

sentences.c: Electric hoist electric hoist for short, is a small light lifting equipment.
sentences.cn: 电动葫芦简称电葫芦，是一种轻小型起重设备。

trans.cn: 太阳能电池板：一组太阳能电池，通常安装在屋顶等地方，可以将太阳能转化为电能。

sentences.c: During this renovation the building's owners, CIS, consulted the solar panel company, Solarcentury.
sentences.cn: 在这次翻新期间，大楼的所有者 CIS 公司咨询了太阳能电池板公司 Solarcentury。

sentences.c: During this renovation, the building's owners, CIS, consulted the solar panel company, Solarcentury.
sentences.cn: 在改造过程中，业主 CIS 咨询了太阳能电池板公司太阳能世纪（Solarcentury）。

sentences.c: Why is the new solar panel more scientific and useful?
sentences.cn: 为什么新的太阳能电池板更科学、更有用？

trans.cn: 运动鞋：一种专门为运动设计的鞋子，通常具有舒适、耐用、透气等特点。

sentences.c: Tom often washes his sports shoes by himself.
sentences.cn: 汤姆经常自己洗他的运动鞋。

sentences.c: My elder brother took off my wet sports shoes and made me sit by the fire.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥脱下我湿漉漉的运动鞋，让我坐在火炉旁。

sentences.c: He wanted to buy a pair of sports shoes for his cousin, but he had to visit four or five shops before finding a pair made in France.
sentences.cn: 他想给侄子买一双运动鞋，但他逛了四五家商店才找到一双法国制造的鞋子。

trans.cn: 低薪：指工资水平低于平均水平或无法满足生活需求的工资水平。

sentences.c: It seemed that not one soul was even paying the slightest bit of attention to poor old Kuangyan.
sentences.cn: 看起来竟没人注意到可怜的矿岩的小小午睡。

sentences.c: For lorry drivers in poor countries, for example, it can be even more commonplace than paying tolls or taxes.
sentences.cn: 对于穷国家的货车司机来说，这可能甚至比缴纳通行税或者税更平常不过了。

sentences.c: Poor youngsters who attend the mainly awful state schools usually end up in these places, paying through the nose.
sentences.cn: 大多数进入糟糕的公立学校的可怜的年轻人，通常在这些地方付出大量代价后被毁掉。

sentences.c: Will overseas training opportunity accessible to common employees?
sentences.cn: 是不是普通员工也可能有海外培训的机会？

sentences.c: The young pilot, on his first overseas training, felt very uneasy.
sentences.cn: 年轻的飞行员第一次海外受训有点紧张。

sentences.c: For overseas training, the training schedule and time required are stated in the technical specification.
sentences.cn: 关于国外培训，技术规范中对培训日程和所需时间均做了说明。

sentences.c: There is no chemical reaction, no by products or side effects.
sentences.cn: 没有化学反应，没有按产品或副作用。

sentences.c: The titanium pot has no chemical reaction with food, therefore, it can keep food's original taste.
sentences.cn: 钛锅在烹饪时不与食材发生化学反应，所以能烹饪出食材的原汁原味。

sentences.c: Keep in mind, this is not a nuclear reaction, but a simple chemical explosion that often (as in this case) results in little or no radioactive material being leaked into the outside world.
sentences.cn: 注意，这并不涉及核反应，只是简单的化学爆炸，它基本不会导致放射性物质泄漏出来。

trans.cn: 当前材料：指在某个时间点上正在使用或处理的材料。

sentences.c: Just as important, this voice also let me know when to read a little faster because the current material just wasn’t that important.
sentences.cn: 就像重要的地方一样，心灵之声还让我知道什么时候可稍微读快点，因为目前所读材料不怎么重要。

sentences.c: Meet with appropriate departments to discuss current material inventories, and establish restock levels or just-in-time strategies.
sentences.cn: 与相关部门会谈讨论目前得物料存货，建立再储存水准或及时战略。

sentences.c: Contentment with poverty and caring only for the principles' means be content with your current material conditions, while attend to cultivation in earnest.
sentences.cn: 安贫乐道就是对现有的物质条件感到满足，对自己的修道要抓紧。

trans.cn: 简短的笔记：一份简短的文字记录，通常用于传达简要信息或提醒事项。

sentences.c: Rather than reading, use brief notes to help you remember key points.
sentences.cn: 不要读演讲稿，使用简短的笔记帮助你记住重点。

sentences.c: This time, make brief notes about the?arguments, evidence, and conclusions.
sentences.cn: 对文中的论点、论据和结论做简明的笔记。

sentences.c: Once you have identified the key ideas you are in a position to take some brief notes or jottings.
sentences.cn: 一旦你确定了主要思路，你就有能力做一些简短的笔记或随笔。

trans.cn: 支持性氛围：指一种积极、鼓励和支持的环境，有助于个人或团体的成长、发展和成功。

sentences.c: Here are ten rules that will help a boss create a supportive atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 以下十条准则会帮助雇主营造一种互助的氛围。

sentences.c: Embrace the supportive atmosphere of a Toastmasters club and nourish visions of success!
sentences.cn: 迎接主持人之家互助的氛围，培养自己成功的愿景吧！

sentences.c: If your company or department does not provide a supportive atmosphere for this kind of behavior, find another employer.
sentences.cn: 假如你的公司或部门没有鼓励这种行为的环境和氛围，那就赶紧另谋高就。

sentences.c: Provide essential training to level I NDT personnel or junior staff.
sentences.cn: 向一级NDT人员或新员工提供必要的培训。

sentences.c: Heart rate monitors are not the essential training tools that some advocates make them out to be.
sentences.cn: 心率表不是某些人主张的，必不可少的训练工具。

sentences.c: Essential training for everyone in your organization. It is also a valuable part of new-employee orientation.

sentences.cn: 在英国大学联合会发布的一份报告中，他提到，非全日制课程、在职培训和网络函授等弹性课程的数量将在未来猛增。

sentences.c: However, if so, this activity will entirely nun the interests of language learning for kids. which shift their flexible foreign language interests into the forced and test-oriented study all the time.
sentences.cn: 它又将灵活的外语学习兴趣变成了整个中学阶段压迫式的应试教育。

sentences.c: Fortunately, new lab facilities dedicated to the study of clouds will soon wrest that field from poets, the geophysicists argue.
sentences.cn: 地球物理学家说：幸运的是，新建的云科学实验室设施，即将从诗人手中夺回这一领域。

sentences.c: Digital Arts USES extensive in-house lab facilities for product assays, producing top-class reviews and trustworthy lab tests.
sentences.cn: 数字式艺术使用广泛的机构内部的实验室设施为产品分析用试样，导致上面类回顾和信得过实验室试验。

sentences.c: The quality management system of Lab facilities in colleges and universities is a certain tendency for developing scientific management.
sentences.cn: 高校实验设备管理建立质量体系，是设备科学管理的必然发展趋势。

sentences.c: At the time, medicine was still a primitive quasi-science.
sentences.cn: 当时，医学仍是原始的准科学。

sentences.c: Despite anything the science of medicine may have achieved, the immune system is our main defence against disease.
sentences.cn: 不管医疗科学已取得了什么样的进步，免疫系统仍是我们抵抗疾病的主要防御手段。

sentences.c: During the 16th century, Europe saw rich developments in science, medicine and the arts.
sentences.cn: 在16世纪，欧洲在科学、医学和艺术方面取得了丰富的发展。

trans.cn: 发动机排量：发动机内活塞在一个循环中从上到下移动的总体积，通常以升为单位表示。

sentences.c: The power output per liter of engine capacity is 115.3 BHP.
sentences.cn: 输出功率的引擎容量每公升115.3马力。

sentences.c: In addition it is a waste of engine capacity and a capital cost penalty to carry unused power potential.
sentences.cn: 同时也是对主机容量的浪费，和未使用马力带来的资本成本。

sentences.c: Taxes on vehicles with an engine capacity smaller than 1.6 liters will be either reduced slightly or unchanged.
sentences.cn: 对发动机排量在1.6升及以下的车辆，征税幅度将小幅降低或保持不变。

synos.cn: 发动机容量；发动机功率；动力机能量

sentences.c: Even though most wired networks still have greater bandwidth than wireless nets, that's trumped by the tremendous social utility of wireless, allowing information to be accessed anytime, anyplace.
sentences.cn: 虽然与无线网络相比，有线网络仍然具有更大的带宽，但是那也是由于无线网络巨大的社会效用对有线网络起了促进作用，这也才使得我们可以在任何时间、任何地点访问信息。

sentences.c: If your files are greater than 2gb, then be sure to use the GNU tar utility.
sentences.cn: 如果文件大于2gb，一定要使用GNU tar实用程序。

sentences.c: Simply put, these motor operators provide a greater degree of power reliability to the ultimate customer while providing the utility the utmost in flexibility and economics.
sentences.cn: 简而言之，这些电机配电盒为最终用户提供了更可靠更强大的服务，同时非常实用和经济。

trans.cn: 安全汽车：指具有高度安全性能的汽车，能够有效地保护乘客免受碰撞、侧翻等事故的伤害。

sentences.c: Gordon: Of course not. Is it a safe car?
sentences.cn: 莫莉：当然有，你的自行车有吗？

sentences.c: The fact that the Berlingo is a safe car is hardly immaterial either.
sentences.cn: 贝林戈是一款安全性能高的车，这一点也非常重要。

sentences.c: Will the car be safe parked in the road?
sentences.cn: 车停在马路上安全吗？

trans.cn: 额外的高度：指超过正常高度的额外高度。

sentences.c: Floor-to-ceiling windows can look stunning, giving the illusion of extra height.
sentences.cn: 从地板直抵天花板的窗户看上去非常漂亮，有增加高度的假象。

sentences.c: A little extra height brings a number of advantages, says Elio Riboli of Imperial College.
sentences.cn: 帝国理工学院的埃利奥·里博利说，长高一点会有很多益处。

sentences.c: In this circumstance whether you use high-heeled shoes you give yourself extra height.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，如果您使用的高跟鞋你给自己更多的高度。

trans.cn: 视野：指人或动物能够看到的范围。

sentences.c: Our field of vision is surprisingly wide.
sentences.cn: 我们的视野令人惊奇地广阔。

sentences.c: The couple moved outside her field of vision.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇离开了她的视野。

sentences.c: It produces "A Blind Spot" in our field of vision.
sentences.cn: 它在我们的视野中产生了“盲点”。

trans.cn: 商业应用：指在商业环境中使用的技术、产品或服务，通常为了实现盈利目的。

sentences.c: That may be enough to change the phenomenon from a laboratory curiosity to something with commercial applications.
sentences.cn: 这可能足以为这一实验室的新奇现象赋予商业应用价值。

sentences.c: You are free to use the service in commercial applications on the Web or elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 此服务可以在 Web 或其他的商业应用程序内使用。

sentences.c: "Rotor craft specifically play a critical role for both military and commercial applications," he said.
sentences.cn: 他说：“旋翼飞机在军事和商业上都发挥着关键的作用。

trans.cn: 经济目的：指为了获得经济利益而进行的活动或行为。

sentences.c: Therefore, developing new style and high performance fault recording and analysis device has grave real and economic purpose.
sentences.cn: 因此，研制开发一种新型的高性能故障录波器具有重大的现实和经济意义。

sentences.c: Then, money shortage's happening could be learned from economic purpose of political reform and its effect on currency in circulation.
sentences.cn: 其后钱荒的发生可从变法的经济目的及其对货币流通产生的影响窥见一斑。

sentences.c: But using CAD, establishing the Auto model using special software to simulate the driving situation and aid Auto design, which have quite economic purpose.
sentences.cn: 但采用CAD技术，建立汽车模型，通过软件模拟汽车行驶状况，来进行汽车设计分析，具有相当的经济意义。

trans.cn: 成本更高，成本较高：指相对于其他选项或情况而言，费用更高。

sentences.c: There could be an even higher cost on your health.
sentences.cn: 你的身体健康甚至会付出更高的代价。

sentences.c: Already some are raising prices to pass on the higher cost to customers.
sentences.cn: 已经有一些钢厂在提高价格，以便把更高的成本转嫁给顾客。

sentences.c: The higher cost of overbooking means airlines will be more conservative.
sentences.cn: 超额预订的成本上升意味着航空公司会愈发保守。

sentences.c: Allowing consumers to buy insurance across state lines will lower the cost of insurance.
sentences.cn: 允许消费者跨越州界购买保险能够降低保险费用。

sentences.c: Vouchercare, by contrast, would simply hand out vouchers of a fixed size, regardless of the actual cost of insurance.
sentences.cn: 相反，代金券医保只仅仅是分发固定数额的代金券，与保险实际花费无关。

sentences.c: When the median age of workers climbs in the United States, so does the cost of insurance their employers must buy for them.
sentences.cn: 在美国当工人的平均年龄攀升的时候，他们的雇主也必须为他们购买相应的保险。

sentences.c: If you're willing togive it up, and let yourself evaporate into the breeze, it can takeyou across, and you can reach your destination, " said the desert inits deep voice."
sentences.cn: 只要你愿意放弃现在的样子，让自己蒸发到微风中，微风就能带着你飞越过去，这样你才能到达目的地。」 沙漠用它低沉的声音说道。

sentences.c: If you're willing to give it up, and let yourself evaporate into the breeze, it can take you across, and you can reach your destination, "said the desert in its deep voice."

sentences.c: Other members of the iguana family include the Fiji Island banded iguana, the desert iguana, and the Galapagos Islands Marine iguana.
sentences.cn: 鬣蜥科的其他分支包括斐济带纹鬣蜥、沙漠鬣蜥、加拉帕戈斯群岛海鬣蜥。

sentences.c: The competition will be at the Marine Corps Air Ground Combat Center in Twentynine Palms, Calif. — a vast installation in the Mojave Desert region east of Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 竞争工作将在加州的美国海军陆战队地面战斗中心进行，该中心在洛山矶东部的莫哈韦沙漠地区中拥有数量众多的设备。

sentences.c: Other members of the iguana family include the Fiji Island banded iguana, the desert iguana, and the Galápagos Islands marine iguana.
sentences.cn: 鬣蜥科的其他分支包括斐济带纹鬣蜥、沙漠鬣蜥、加拉帕戈斯群岛海鬣蜥。

trans.cn: 社交互动：人与人之间的交流和互动，包括语言交流、身体语言、面部表情等。

sentences.c: They feel uncomfortable when engaging in social interactions.
sentences.cn: 他们在参与社会互动时感到不舒服。

sentences.c: She just spent several months studying social interactions in Indonesia and she's been influential in ethnology.
sentences.cn: 她刚在印度尼西亚花了几个月的时间研究了社会互动，而且她在人类文化学方面也很有影响。

sentences.c: Those who misunderstand the impact of social interactions may not, in some contexts, be social enough for their own well-being.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下，那些对社会互动的影响有误解的人，其社交程度也许不足以维持自身的幸福感。

trans.cn: 意外的噪音：指突然出现或未预料到的声音，可能会引起惊吓或干扰。

sentences.c: They jumped at the unexpected noise.
sentences.cn: 他们因突如其来的声音吓得跳了起来。

sentences.c: They jumped located at the unexpected noise.
sentences.cn: 他们因突如其来的声响吓得跳了起来。

sentences.c: A horse may kick at any sudden, unexpected noise.
sentences.cn: 任何突如其来的噪音都有可能使马后踢。

trans.cn: 循序渐进的方式：一种逐步、稳步发展的方法，通常用于描述学习、改变或进步的过程。

sentences.c: It's going to happen in a gradual way.
sentences.cn: 这样的事情发生在一个渐进的方式。

sentences.c: When you decide to end a friendship, she suggests doing so in a gradual way.
sentences.cn: 她建议当你决定结束一份友谊时，要采取循序渐进的方式。

sentences.c: Definition: % Unlike ghosting, the slow fade is a more gradual way of cutting off communication with someone you're seeing.
sentences.cn: 定义：与如鬼魅般消失不一样，慢动作消失指的是你约会的对象慢慢地斩断跟你的联系。

trans.cn: 工作职责：指在工作中需要承担的任务和责任，包括工作范围、工作目标、工作内容、工作标准等方面的要求。

sentences.c: Users are granted membership in the roles based on their job responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 为用户授予角色中的成员资格时，以用户的工作职责为依据。

sentences.c: Ask the manager to write down all of their current job responsibilities on Post-It Notes.
sentences.cn: 让经理在便签上写下他们目前所有的工作职责。

sentences.c: If none of the name metaphones are a match, the job responsibilities metaphones are searched.
sentences.cn: 如果未找到任何名称变音位匹配，则搜索工作职责变音位。

sentences.c: Employing every on-campus resource he could find, Blake even used faculty connections to bring him into contact with local real estate developers who gave him advice.
sentences.cn: 布雷克利用了所有他能找到的校内资源，甚至动用老师的社会关系去接触本地房地产开发商，并从他们那里得到了建议。

sentences.c: Local television station WAFF, quoting a police official, said the woman detained after Friday's shootings was a faculty member.
sentences.cn: 州电视台WAFF引用警方官员介绍说，这名在星期五枪击案中被逮捕的妇女也是一名大学教员。

sentences.c: Funny thing is, they often claim their faculty as the top xx in the whole country regardless the school is actually a pretty lousy place even you cannot find any related news from the local tabloid.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是，他们常常声称作为全国最高二十教员无论学校实际上是一个非常糟糕的地方，即使你找不到任何地方小报相关消息。

sentences.c: She may also consider future job and the material background of her new lover.
sentences.cn: 考虑工作，考虑对方的物质基础。

sentences.c: Such background material inevitably reflects who we are.
sentences.cn: 这些背景材料必然会反映出我们是谁。

sentences.c: The focus is really on eruptions in the last five years, but it might have some useful background material.
sentences.cn: 人们关注的焦点其实是过去五年的火山爆发，但它可能会提供一些有用的背景资料。

trans.cn: 未回答的问题：指尚未得到答复或解决的问题。

sentences.c: The report of the judges leaves a lot of unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 法官们的报告留下了许多没有回答的问题。

sentences.c: There were some holes in that theory, some unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 那个理论中有些漏洞，一些没有得到解答的问题。

sentences.c: There are still a lot of unanswered questions in this area, but fish and seafood are a major part of the Mediterranean diet.
sentences.cn: 这个领域仍然存在很多无法回答的问题，但是鱼类和海鲜是地中海饮食的一个主要部分。

trans.cn: 标准格式：一种被广泛接受和使用的规范化的文件或数据格式。

sentences.c: But a standard format such as HR-XML has advantages.
sentences.cn: 但像HR - XML这样的标准格式有一些好处。

sentences.c: Preferably a standard format that works across differentmanufacturers.
sentences.cn: 更完美的是一个可在不同厂家间通用的标准格式。

sentences.c: It will be important in the near future to arrive at a standard format.
sentences.cn: 在不远的将来达成一个标准格式是很重要的。

trans.cn: 实用知识：指能够应用于实际生活和工作中的知识和技能。

sentences.c: Sternberg notes that traditional tests best assess analytical and verbal skills but fail to measure creativity and practical knowledge, components also critical to problem solving and life success.
sentences.cn: 施特恩伯格指出，传统的测试最能评估分析和语言技能，但却无法衡量创造力和实践知识，而这些也是解决问题和实现成功的关键因素。

sentences.c: The rise of vocational school has risen to fill this gap of practical knowledge.
sentences.cn: 职业学校的出现填补了实践知识的空白。

sentences.c: There's so much information and practical knowledge that it's impossible to present but a fraction here.
sentences.cn: 它包含如此丰富的信息和实践知识，我们在这里所能列举的实属凤毛麟角。

trans.cn: 商业新闻：一种关注商业和经济领域的新闻报道，通常包括公司财务、市场趋势、行业分析等内容。

sentences.c: Something very strange is going on in business journalism.
sentences.cn: 眼下的商业新闻报道出现了一种非常奇怪的现象。

sentences.c: This is business journalism animated by the spirit of the Duracell bunny.
sentences.cn: 这是一本受到金霸王电池兔精神鼓舞的商业杂志。

sentences.c: Jim Michaels, transformer of business journalism, died on October 2nd, aged 86.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·麦克·尔斯，商业新闻业的缔造者，死于2007年10月2日，享年86岁。

trans.cn: 科学术语：科学家在其专业活动中使用的语言部分。

sentences.c: Anyone wants to take a stab at the scientific term for visible light?
sentences.cn: 有人想解释一下可见光的科学名称吗？

sentences.c: The scientific term for an animal with mingled cells from two species is chimera.
sentences.cn: 由两个物种的细胞混合而诞生的动物，其科学术语唤作嵌合体。

sentences.c: Torque is the scientific term for turning force, and it is measured in newton-metres (Nm).
sentences.cn: 扭矩是一个用来描述扭转力的科学术语，它的单位是牛顿-米（Nm）。

sentences.c: It used abstract art and often childish language to ridicule the absurdity of the modern world.
sentences.cn: 它使用抽象的艺术和幼稚的语言嘲弄了现代世界的荒谬。

sentences.c: Dear, when I have time for cynicism, which is the number of childish language, than I am proud of it.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的，以前当我还玩世不恭的时候，这是多少幼稚的语言，比不上我的骄傲。

sentences.c: Their innocent beauty derives from love, represented as the beauty of purity and divinity, and conveyed through childish but fresh metaphor and personification of language.
sentences.cn: 她们的童心源于爱，体现为圣洁、神性之美，而通过稚拙新鲜的比喻和拟人式的语言表达出来。

trans.cn: 种子发芽：种子在适宜的环境条件下开始生长的过程，包括种子吸水、膨胀、根的生长和幼苗的出土等阶段。

sentences.c: We wish to increase our knowledge of plant seed germination and anisotropic cell growth through understanding their action mechanisms of these novel active small molecules.
sentences.cn: 通过对这些新型活性小分子作用机理的研究，我们希望增加对植物种子萌发及细胞各向异性生长的知识。

sentences.c: The strategies for adaptation of halophytes to saline and arid environments during seed germination stage: (1) high salinity and temperature induce seeds to remain dormancy.
sentences.cn: 盐生植物种子萌发期间适应盐渍和干旱环境的策略表现在：(1)高盐和高温诱导种子休眠。

sentences.c: The experimental study on the impacts of CO2 concentration on plant seed germination percentage, germination energy and leaf structure is conducted by using OTC-1 Open Top Chambers.
sentences.cn: 利用OTC - 1型开顶式气室进行了CO2浓度对植物种子发芽率、发芽势以及叶片形态结构的影响试验研究。

trans.cn: 客观事实：指与主观想法无关的客观存在的事实或情况。

sentences.c: Classical art reaches the unity of spirit and matter and its idea appearance and objective matters are unified.
sentences.cn: 古典型艺术达到了精神与物质的统一，理念显现与客体性相正好统一。

sentences.c: The things should possess the following characteristics: first, the things are objective matters and property rights.
sentences.cn: 这样的物应该具备以下特征：首先，物是客观存在的物质和财产利益。

sentences.c: When the objective matters are studied by models, the forecasting results obtained by perfect fitting will not necessarily be very good. In this paper, the causes of error produced are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 借助于模型研究客观事物时，好的拟合得到的预测不一定很好，本文分析了产生误差的原因。

trans.cn: 住房项目：通常由政府为低收入家庭提供一组房屋或公寓。

sentences.c: Then there is the scale of the typical housing project.
sentences.cn: 然后另一点就是一般房地产项目的规模。

sentences.c: The housing project is hard to shove for attention among multibillion-pound infrastructure projects, so it is inevitable that the attention is focused elsewhere.

sentences.c: The city authorized a housing project.
sentences.cn: 该市批准了一项住房建筑规划。

sentences.c: Developers can tweak the cosmetics of a theme to change colors and fonts.
sentences.cn: 开发人员可以调整主题的修饰来更改颜色和字体。

sentences.cn: 主题惟一的作用就是提供要使用的颜色和字体的值。

trans.cn: 书本津贴：为购买书籍提供的一定金额的补贴，通常用于学生或员工购买教材、参考书等。

sentences.c: A book allowance is a good idea.
sentences.cn: 书本补贴的办法也不错。

sentences.c: Even if the allowance allows for the purchase of one paperback book or magazine a week, you've helped encourage reading.
sentences.cn: 即使这钱只可以买一本平装书或是每个星期一本杂志，你也是在鼓励他们阅读。

sentences.c: Even though most wired networks still have greater bandwidth than wireless nets, that's trumped by the tremendous social utility of wireless, allowing information to be accessed anytime, anyplace.
sentences.cn: 虽然与无线网络相比，有线网络仍然具有更大的带宽，但是那也是由于无线网络巨大的社会效用对有线网络起了促进作用，这也才使得我们可以在任何时间、任何地点访问信息。

sentences.c: If your files are greater than 2gb, then be sure to use the GNU tar utility.

etymology.t: coconut:（椰子）：西班牙神话中可怕的鬼脸
etymology.d:
在西班牙及葡萄牙神话中，有一个可怕的妖怪叫做coco，他长着一个南瓜头，面目可 怖。家长们经常用它来吓唬小孩。在口语中，coco表示“鬼脸、骷髅”。当葡萄牙殖民者到达太平洋岛屿时，他们发现岛上有很多椰树，所结果实的底部有三个 凹陷处，看上去像个鬼脸，所以就用coco来命名，将其称为coconut，字面意思就是“鬼脸坚果”。
coconut：['kəʊkənʌt] n.椰子，椰子肉
来自葡萄牙语。coco, 狰狞的，nut，坚果。因该热带水果剥掉外层皮后，从底部看去如同狰狞的脸而得名。

coconut（椰子）这种水果的底部有三个小洞，很象一张怪脸：两只眼睛，一张嘴。Coco在西班牙语和葡萄牙语中意思是“怪相”、“鬼脸”。Coconut的字面含义则是“鬼脸三角壳果”。
Coconut又写做cocoanut，这倒不是因为它与cocoa（可可）有什么关系，而是由于英国辞典编纂家Dr. Samuel Johnson（1709——1784）的笔误，以致以讹传讹，流传至今。
