sentences.cn: 鼓励人才向国家重点加强的行业、部门以及国家重点建设工程和重点科研项目流动。

sentences.c: Take advanced scientific research technology as backup force;
sentences.cn: 以先进的科研技术为后盾；

trans.cn: 迁移模式：各种物种在一年中从一个栖息地迁移到另一个栖息地的季节性移动的方式。

sentences.c: lt's a little crazy for me to be writing about migration patterns without actually knowing how they stay underwater for so long.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，在不知道它们是如何在水下呆这么久的情况下，写它们的洄游模式有点疯狂。

sentences.c: You know, I am writing that paper about whales and the path they travel as they swim through the ocean, their migration patterns.
sentences.cn: 你知道，我正在写那篇关于鲸鱼的论文，它是关于鲸鱼在海洋中游泳的路径以及它们的移动模式。

sentences.c: Working out bird migration patterns was one of the triumphs of natural history.
sentences.cn: 找出鸟类迁移规律才是自然学史上无数可嘉可贺的成就之一。

trans.cn: 保存下来的遗体或动植物遗骸：经过特殊处理保存下来的动植物遗体或遗骸，通常用于研究或展览。

sentences.c: The mystery of the mummy's death may have been resolved, but the mystery of how it was preserved remains.
sentences.cn: 这具木乃伊的死因之谜可能已经得到了解决，但是这具木乃伊是怎么保存的还是一个谜团。

sentences.c: Thanks to archaeologists' tireless effort, the preserved remains will give visitors an insight into the history surrounding Tasmania's first colonial establishment.
sentences.cn: 考古学家孜孜不倦努力的重溯，坚持尽量要让参访的人，能够体会到塔斯马尼亚第一批殖民的原始遗迹。

sentences.c: The probability that actual remains of soft tissue will be preserved is improved if the organism dies in an environment of rapid deposition and oxygen deprivation.
sentences.cn: 如果生物体死于一个快速沉积和缺氧的环境，那么软组织残骸实际保存下来的可能性会提高。

trans.cn: 矿物土壤：一种由矿物质或岩石衍生而来，含有很少腐殖质或有机物的土壤。

sentences.c: Humus is classified according to how well it is incorporated into the mineral soil, the types of organisms involved in its decomposition, and the vegetation from which it is derived.
sentences.cn: 根据腐殖质与矿物质土壤的结合程度、分解作用中所含的有机物类型以及原有的植被，腐殖质可区分为几个类型。

sentences.c: The mineral elements from the soil that are usable by the plant must be dissolved in the soil solution before they can be taken into the root.
sentences.cn: 土壤中对植物有用的矿物质元素必须先溶解在土壤溶液中，然后才能被根吸收。

sentences.c: In modern agriculture, mineral depletion of soils is a major concern, since harvesting crops interrupts the recycling of nutrients back to the soil.
sentences.cn: 在现代农业中，土壤的矿物损耗是一个主要的问题，因为收割农作物会中断养分的循环，使其无法重新回到土壤中。

trans.cn: 卷尺：一种窄条形的带子（如软布或钢带），上面标有单位（如英寸或厘米），用于测量长度。

sentences.c: Make sure the tape measure is level all the way around.
sentences.cn: 确保卷尺是水平的。

sentences.c: Tape Measure Murder is a short story by Agatha Christie.
sentences.cn: 《卷尺谋杀》是阿加莎·克里斯蒂的短篇小说。

sentences.c: It tells the fashion industry that it must take responsibility for the signal it sends women, especially teenage girls, about the social tape measure they must use to determine their individual worth.
sentences.cn: 这告诫了时尚产业，对于该用什么样的社会标尺来判定自己的个人价值这一问题，该产业必须对其向女性，特别是少女发出的信号负责。

sentences.c: Soft sediment deformation is one of the key indicators identifying the existence of paleo-earthquake.
sentences.cn: 软沉积物变形构造是确定古地震存在的关键证据之一。

sentences.c: However, I did find some really cool places where there had been soft sediment deformation, probably from the rocks landing in marshy areas next to the river.
sentences.cn: 然而，我确实发现了一些真正酷的地方，那儿曾经有一些柔软的沉淀物异形，可能从岩石飘落在紧邻河流的沼泽区域。

sentences.c: The sample consisted of pebbles of hardened sediment that had once been soft, deep-sea mud, as well as granules of gypsum and fragments of volcanic rock.
sentences.cn: 这一样本包括曾经柔软的的硬化沉积物的卵石、深海淤泥以及石膏颗粒和火山岩碎片。

trans.cn: 植物盆：用作植物生长容器的盆。

sentences.c: John: I made a plant pot out of an old water bottle!
sentences.cn: 约翰：我把一个旧水壶改装成一个花盆了！

sentences.c: The key was still in the plant pot and I took it out.
sentences.cn: 钥匙还在花盆里，我把它拿了出来。

sentences.c: You can now pick which seed type to plant in garden and wall plant pot!
sentences.cn: 你现在可以在花园和植物园中挑选哪种种子类型的植物！

trans.cn: 房地产经纪人：负责买卖或管理房地产的专业人士。

sentences.c: "I'm sorry," he told the real estate agent, "but we really must go now."
sentences.cn: “对不起，”他告诉房地产经纪人，“但我们的确要走了。”

sentences.c: When the estate agent showed us this house, we knew we wanted it right away.
sentences.cn: 当房地产经纪人带我们看这所房子时，我们就知道要立刻买下它。

sentences.c: Many of the aspects of home buying aren't a consideration for children, said Tracey Hampson, a real estate agent based in Santa Clarita, Calif.
sentences.cn: 加州圣塔克拉利塔的房地产经纪人特蕾西·汉普森说，买房时，很多方面孩子们都没有考虑到。

synos.cn: [经]房地产掮客，房地产经纪人

trans.cn: 植物园：一个通常设有温室，用于培育、研究和展示特殊植物的花园。

sentences.c: Established in 1670, the over 70-acre Royal Botanic Garden is a center of gardening excellence.
sentences.cn: 建于1670年，占地70多英亩的皇家植物园是一个令人称赞的园艺中心。

sentences.c: Excuse me, is this the bus to the Royal Botanic Garden?
sentences.cn: 请问这辆车是去皇家植物园的吗？

sentences.c: This open-air space is also part of the Botanic Garden.
sentences.cn: 这个户外空间也是植物园的一部分。

sentences.c: Unlike the guys in the raft, we had an emergency locator beacon so the Coast Guard could find us.
sentences.cn: 与呆在救生艇上的人不同的是，我们有一个紧急定位信标，所以海岸警卫队能发现我们。

trans.cn: 消化问题：指影响人体消化系统正常运作的各种疾病或不适症状，如胃痛、腹泻、便秘等。

sentences.c: An occasional watery stool may be due to a mild digestive problem.
sentences.cn: 偶然便便较水状可能是轻微的消化问题。

sentences.c: And the associated risk of cancer in the digestive system may be more of a dietary problem too much fat and a lack of fiber than a weight problem.
sentences.cn: 消化系统癌症的相关风险可能更多的是饮食问题，即脂肪过多和缺乏纤维素，而不是体重问题。

sentences.c: So Kevin Hall and his colleagues at the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases, in Bethesda, Maryland, decided to look at the problem in a new way.
sentences.cn: 因此凯文•豪尔和他所在国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所（马里兰州比色达）的同事们决定用新的方法来研究这个问题。

trans.cn: 红细胞：含有血红蛋白的细胞，负责将氧气输送到组织中。

sentences.c: Red blood cells are roughly the shape of a disk.
sentences.cn: 红细胞大致呈圆盘状。

sentences.c: Isabelle's body is unable to produce healthy red blood cells.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔体内无法产生健康的红细胞。

sentences.c: After a pint of blood is collected, it is processed into its transfusible components: plasma, platelets and red blood cells.
sentences.cn: 采集一品脱血液后，将其加工成可输血的成分：血浆、血小板和红细胞。

trans.cn: 减肥：由于流体、脂肪、组织等的流失而导致总体重减少。

sentences.c: Since weight loss is not my goal, it is less important for me to track my weight each week.
sentences.cn: 既然减肥不是我的目标，每周记录体重对我来说就不那么重要了。

sentences.c: The weight loss began to look more serious.
sentences.cn: 体重的减轻开始显得更严重。

sentences.c: Snacks that offer miraculous weight loss are a con.
sentences.cn: 那些可以神速减肥的快餐食品是个骗局。

trans.cn: 渔网：渔网是一种渔民用来捕鱼的网，用来围困并捕捉水底的鱼、虾及蟹等水生动物。渔网也可以作为一种隔离工具，例如防鲨网可以用来防护鲨鱼之类的具危险性的大型鱼类进入人类水域。

sentences.c: The frog told her to hold out her fishing net to the sun's rays and he would sing a magic song.
sentences.cn: 青蛙告诉她把渔网伸到阳光下，他就会唱一首神奇的歌。

sentences.c: There are some fish in the fishing net.
sentences.cn: 渔网里有鱼。

sentences.c: He put down his fishing net and returned to his small room.
sentences.cn: 他放下鱼网，回到他的小房间。

trans.cn: 鸽子和老鼠：通常指城市中的鸽子和老鼠，因为它们经常被认为是城市环境中的常见害虫。

sentences.c: If Skinner kept the focus on rats and pigeons and dogs, he would not have the impact that he did but he argued that you could extend all of these notions to humans and to human behavior.
sentences.cn: 如果斯金纳只是研究老鼠鸽子或是狗，他就不会拥有如此巨大的有影响力了，但他宣称，这些概念是可以应用到，人类以及人类行为中去的。

trans.cn: 矿物土壤：一种由矿物质或岩石衍生而来，含有很少腐殖质或有机物的土壤。

sentences.c: Humus is classified according to how well it is incorporated into the mineral soil, the types of organisms involved in its decomposition, and the vegetation from which it is derived.
sentences.cn: 根据腐殖质与矿物质土壤的结合程度、分解作用中所含的有机物类型以及原有的植被，腐殖质可区分为几个类型。

sentences.c: The mineral elements from the soil that are usable by the plant must be dissolved in the soil solution before they can be taken into the root.
sentences.cn: 土壤中对植物有用的矿物质元素必须先溶解在土壤溶液中，然后才能被根吸收。

sentences.c: In modern agriculture, mineral depletion of soils is a major concern, since harvesting crops interrupts the recycling of nutrients back to the soil.
sentences.cn: 在现代农业中，土壤的矿物损耗是一个主要的问题，因为收割农作物会中断养分的循环，使其无法重新回到土壤中。

trans.cn: 静水：指流动不明显的河流或水域的一部分。

sentences.c: Where 50-kilogram king salmon once fought their way up waterfalls to lay their eggs in gravel beds, there now are only concrete walls holding back still water and deep beds of muddy deposits.
sentences.cn: 50公斤重的大马哈鱼王曾经奋力爬上瀑布，把卵产在砾石床上，现在只有混凝土墙挡住静止的水和深深的泥床。

sentences.c: The still water of the lake mirrored the shapely figure of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 平静的湖水映出山的优美轮廓。

sentences.c: Still water run deep.
sentences.cn: 静水常深。

sentences.c: The processed applesauce was aseptically packed into plastic cups and stored at room temperature.
sentences.cn: 加工过的苹果酱无菌包装在塑料杯里，并在室温下保存。

sentences.c: Research has shown that watermelons can be stored in room temperature. Do remember that they must be whole.
sentences.cn: 研究表明西瓜可以在室温下储存。记住它们必须是完整的。

sentences.c: The electrical energy generated originally by the wind turbines originally is stored as a temperature difference between the two rock-filled silos.
sentences.cn: 这种电能最初由风力涡轮机发电产生，然后以温差的形式存储于两个装满砂砾的筒仓里。

trans.cn: 冷冻食品：经过快速冷冻并保持冷冻状态直到使用的食品。

sentences.c: The popularity of TV led to the popularity of frozen food.
sentences.cn: 电视的普及带动了冷冻食品的普及。

sentences.c: Sometimes I use frozen food for dinner.
sentences.cn: 有时我把冷冻食品用于晚餐。

sentences.c: Mum, I see some ice-cream at the frozen food section.
sentences.cn: 妈妈，我在冷冻食品部分看见一些冰淇淋。

trans.cn: 迁移模式：各种物种在一年中从一个栖息地迁移到另一个栖息地的季节性移动的方式。

sentences.c: lt's a little crazy for me to be writing about migration patterns without actually knowing how they stay underwater for so long.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，在不知道它们是如何在水下呆这么久的情况下，写它们的洄游模式有点疯狂。

sentences.c: You know, I am writing that paper about whales and the path they travel as they swim through the ocean, their migration patterns.
sentences.cn: 你知道，我正在写那篇关于鲸鱼的论文，它是关于鲸鱼在海洋中游泳的路径以及它们的移动模式。

sentences.c: Working out bird migration patterns was one of the triumphs of natural history.
sentences.cn: 找出鸟类迁移规律才是自然学史上无数可嘉可贺的成就之一。

trans.cn: 橄榄油：一种从橄榄中提取的浅黄色至黄绿色的非干性油，富含单不饱和脂肪，主要用作沙拉油和烹饪油。

sentences.c: Olive oil and garlic feature prominently in his recipes.
sentences.cn: 橄榄油和大蒜在他的食谱中显得很重要。

sentences.c: Only extra-virgin olive oil will do on recherché dinner tables.
sentences.cn: 只有特纯橄榄油才能上讲究的餐桌。

sentences.c: Its fruit can be made into olive oil.
sentences.cn: 它的果实可以制成橄榄油。

trans.cn: 山羊皮：山羊的皮毛，通常用于制作皮革制品，如鞋子、手套、衣服等。

sentences.c: The retanning and finishing technology of Jining goat skin soft bag leather was studied.
sentences.cn: 对济宁路山羊软包袋革复鞣及整饰工艺进行了研究。

sentences.c: The technology on processing the deer imitation garment with goat skin was discussed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文简要介绍了山羊皮仿鹿服装蓝湿革的加工技术要点。

sentences.c: Natural pigment in grain layer of goat skin and pig skin was bleached by hydrogen peroxide and ultrasound.
sentences.cn: 探讨了采用过氧化氢及超声波除去山羊皮及猪皮粒面层色素的方法。

sentences.c: He may not be at risk for any particular disease.
sentences.cn: 他甚至不可能有换任何疾病的危险。

sentences.c: This is not about one particular disease or even about Death.
sentences.cn: 这并非关乎某种特定疾病甚至死亡。

sentences.c: Let us say that you are ill and desire to recover from a particular disease that is ailing you.
sentences.cn: 让我们说，你正患病并渴望从某个正折磨你的特殊疾病中康复。

trans.cn: 使命宣言：陈述企业或组织目的或目标的内容。通常用于描述企业或组织的宗旨和价值观，以及其在市场中的定位和目标。

sentences.c: Our mission statement is to be the best design firm in the world.
sentences.cn: 我们的宗旨是成为世界上最好的设计公司。

sentences.c: "If we're successful," their mission statement reads, "we believe this will be one of the most important and widely beneficial scientific advances ever made."
sentences.cn: “如果我们成功了，”他们的任务声明写道，“我们相信这将是有史以来最重要、最有益的科学进步之一。”

sentences.c: Compose a Mission Statement.
sentences.cn: 撰写一篇任务报告。

etymology.d: mission,使命，宗旨，statement,陈述，表达。引申词义宗旨说明。

trans.cn: 行政人员：负责组织和管理日常行政工作的职员，包括文件处理、会议安排、人员调度等。

sentences.c: Since its establishment, the government officer system in Ningbo has been effective in improving administration efficiency, enhancing personnel quality.
sentences.cn: 宁波市自公务员制度实施以来，取得了不少显著的成绩，对提高行政效率，优化干部队伍素质起到了积极作用。

sentences.c: First of all, the system of liability of law-officer of ancient China is one of the symbols of the maturity of the administration of country.
sentences.cn: 门中国古代司法官责任规定的法律化、制度化，这是国家管理走向成熟的标志。

sentences.c: We are not machines or robots.
sentences.cn: 我们不是机器或机器人。

sentences.c: Machines such as these take researchers into the field of socialised robotics: how to make robots act in a way that does not scare or offend individuals.
sentences.cn: 诸如此类的机器促使研究人员步入了机器人社会化的领域：即，如何让机器人以一种既不会吓到或冒犯到别人的方式行动。

sentences.c: A lot of work your fathers and grandfathers used to do is now done by machines like computers or computerized robots.
sentences.cn: 许多你们父亲和祖父过去做的工作今天已经被象电脑或电脑机器人这样的机器来完成。

trans.cn: 平稳的行驶：指车辆或交通工具在行驶过程中没有颠簸或震动，给乘客带来舒适的体验。

sentences.c: The Bullet train offers a fast, smooth ride between Tokyo and other major cities in Japan.
sentences.cn: 子弹头列车在东京和日本其他主要城市之间提供了快速、平稳的旅程。

sentences.c: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
sentences.cn: 活动的悬挂系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

sentences.c: No one predicts a smooth ride between now and June.
sentences.cn: 没人预测现在和六月之间能一切顺利。

trans.cn: 橡胶轮胎：一种由橡胶制成的车轮，通常用于汽车、自行车、摩托车等交通工具上。

sentences.c: This is a solid rubber tyre.
sentences.cn: 这些窗帘是纯蓝色的。

sentences.c: I'm going to renew a rubber tyre.
sentences.cn: 我要更新一只轮胎。

sentences.c: First, you mustn't get a coach, second, you mustn't use a rubber tyre, as you won't learn if you use one.
sentences.cn: 第一不要请先生，第二不要拿橡皮圈，你搞那个橡皮圈就学不会。

sentences.c: For hot desert locations with access to seawater, a new greenhouse design generates freshwater and cool air.
sentences.cn: 对于能够接触到海水的炎热沙漠地区，一个新的温室设计可以产生淡水和冷空气。

sentences.c: The world largest telescopes are found in such remote mountain locations as the Andes Mountains of Chile, the desert peaks of Arizona, and Mauna Kea in Hawaii, a dormant volcano.
sentences.cn: 世界上最大的望远镜是在一些偏远山区发现的，包括智利的安第斯山脉，亚利桑那州的沙漠山峰，以及夏威夷的莫纳基亚休眠火山。

sentences.c: The ideal locations for fog harvesting are mountainous and desert regions where fog is present but water sources are far away.
sentences.cn: 收集雾气的理想地点是远离水源但有雾聚集的山区和沙漠。

trans.cn: 苏格兰南部：苏格兰的一个地理区域，包括爱丁堡、格拉斯哥和邓迪等城市。

sentences.c: Dow Spout is a terraced, step-like waterfall located on the slopes of Craignaw in southern Scotland.
sentences.cn: 道琼斯壶嘴是个梯子状的瀑布，坐落在苏格兰南部加洛韦山的坡上。

sentences.c: Bur most Scots are Lowlanders, concentrated in the densely-populated towns and cities of southern Scotland.
sentences.cn: 但是大大都的苏格兰人是盆地人，集中在苏格兰南部人口稠密的乡村和城镇。

sentences.c: Weather Forecast for Britain in the next two days will withstand the storm, will be the principal place of the attack on Northern Ireland and southern Scotland.
sentences.cn: 天气预报预测英国将在未来几天将会经受两场暴风雨，主要遇袭地点将会是北爱尔兰和苏格兰南部。

trans.cn: 总部：一个公司或组织的主要行政中心。

sentences.c: Conference calls with head offices in America at 4am are tedious.
sentences.cn: 美国总部早晨四点的电话会议冗长而乏味。

sentences.c: Firms would simply move their head offices to friendlier countries.
sentences.cn: 公司可能更容易将它们的总部转移到更友好的国家。

sentences.c: They are employed at head offices or branches of insurance companies.
sentences.cn: 他们受雇于保险公司的总部或分支机构。

trans.cn: 全球市场：指所有世界各地购买或可能想购买某种商品的人。

sentences.c: Farmers going grass-fed are not affected by the ever-changing milk prices of the global market.
sentences.cn: 用草饲养奶牛的农民不会受到全球市场不断波动的牛奶价格的影响。

sentences.c: I think this a global market.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一个全球性的市场。

sentences.c: This is an extension of global market competitions.
sentences.cn: 这是全球范围市场竞争的延伸。

trans.cn: 安全环境：指一个没有危险或风险的地方，人们可以在其中感到安全和保护。

sentences.c: We do, however, provide as safe environment as possible for younger children .
sentences.cn: 但是，我们会为年幼的孩子们提供尽可能安全的环境。

sentences.c: Teacher's aides need to prepare materials, help children finish activities and create a safe environment.
sentences.cn: 助教需要准备材料，帮助孩子完成活动并营造安全的环境。

sentences.c: Find a safe environment.
sentences.cn: 找一个安全的环境。

trans.cn: 喂食时间：指动物园或养殖场等地的动物定时进食的时间段。

sentences.c: Does the dog barks only at feeding time?
sentences.cn: 这只狗只在喂食的时候叫吗？

sentences.c: I believe your fish will surely know when it is feeding time.
sentences.cn: 我相信你的鱼一定会知道什么时候是喂食时间。

sentences.c: We used to have the main feeding time in the afternoon at around 3 pm, but we found that some of the animals got a bit hungry waiting until then and so we now have it at noon.
sentences.cn: 我们过去主要的喂食时间是下午3点左右，但我们发现等到那时有些动物会有点饿，所以我们现在的喂食时间是中午。

trans.cn: 听力丧失：部分或完全听力丧失的状态。

sentences.c: This is what causes hearing loss.
sentences.cn: 这就是导致听力丧失的原因。

sentences.c: It causes temporary hearing loss.
sentences.cn: 它会导致暂时性的听力损伤。

sentences.c: The people who have hearing loss are considered deaf.
sentences.cn: 听力丧失的人被视作聋人。

trans.cn: 银币：由银制成的货币，通常用于交易和收藏。

sentences.c: How did Fred get silver coins in his dream?
sentences.cn: 弗雷德在梦里是怎么得到银币的？

sentences.c: He sold his remaining rice and got some silver coins.
sentences.cn: 他卖掉了剩下的米，换了一些银币。

sentences.c: He used the silver coins to buy a pair of goats.
sentences.cn: 他用银币买了两只山羊。

trans.cn: 运输成本：指将货物或人员从一个地方运送到另一个地方所需的费用。

sentences.c: As a result, 17% of its wealth went into transport costs.
sentences.cn: 结果，它17%的钱都花在了交通费用上。

sentences.c: Transport costs have shot up.
sentences.cn: 运输成本也在增加。

sentences.c: After 6 percent rise in 2007, total transport costs were up less than 2 percent last year.
sentences.cn: 在2007年上升6个百分点之后，去年整体运输费用上升少于2个百分点。

trans.cn: 造船：指建造船只的过程，包括设计、制造、装配和试验等。

sentences.c: The area's ship building tradition, partly established by the Vikings, also meant that sophisticated carpentry was a major aspect of the local culture.
sentences.cn: 该地区的造船传统，部分是由维京人建立的，也意味着熟练的木工是当地文化的一个主要方面。

sentences.c: He said the new plant would produce steel plates with a width of more than two meters used in automotive or ship building industries in the country.
sentences.cn: 他说新厂将生产用于本国汽车或轮船建造工业的两米多宽的钢板。

sentences.c: You have advantages and distinctive technologies and techniques in such sectors as auto-making, ship building, aircraft manufacturing, sewage treatment, brewery and bio-pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 中东欧在汽车、船舶、飞机制造、污水处理、酿酒和生物制药等许多行业都有优势，许多技术和工艺极具特色。

trans.cn: 清洁性能：指某种物质或产品具有去除污垢、杀菌消毒等清洁作用的特性。

sentences.c: The liquid you can find in the shelves of drug store is an herbal extract with exceptional cleansing, soothing, and healing properties.
sentences.cn: 你可以在药店的架子上找到北美金缕梅的萃取液，它有清洁、镇定、修护皮肤的作用。

sentences.c: Cleansing Products industry: the excellent insulating properties of the Refined Carnauba Wax makes it of great use by this industry.
sentences.cn: 清洁产品行业：卓越的隔绝性能，精制的巴西棕榈蜡被广泛应用于该行业。

sentences.c: To ensure a good electrical properties, the parts were sent to the assembly plant, will first try for cleansing process.
sentences.cn: 为确保产品有良好电器性能，各零件被送往组装工场前，都会先作清洗处理程序。

trans.cn: 树胶树：一种产生树胶的树木，主要分布在澳大利亚和非洲。

sentences.c: Someone told me there's another hostel called Gum Tree something.
sentences.cn: 有人告诉我那儿还有家招待所，叫“桉树”什么的。

sentences.c: We live in a place called Gum Tree.
sentences.cn: 我们住在一个叫桉树村的地方。

sentences.c: Gum Tree? Is it here near the town of Ashland?
sentences.cn: 桉树村？它是在阿什·兰德镇的附近吗？

sentences.c: We expect that this approach will get us closer to understanding the balance between gene content and gene regulation in the question of human-chimp diversity.
sentences.cn: 我们希望这种方法可以使我们了解在基因多态性中基因结构和基因调节的平衡。

sentences.c: We thus hypothesized that tumor diversity also holds true at the gene expression level.
sentences.cn: 我们因此假设肿瘤多样化在基因表达层面也成立。

sentences.c: SRAP and TRAP are being applied in germplasm genetic diversity analysis, genetic map including transcriptome map construction, important trait gene tagging and gene cloning in many crops.
sentences.cn: 目前这两种标记系统已开始在多种作物的种质资源鉴定评价、遗传图谱构建(包括转录图谱)、重要性状标记乃至基因分离克隆等方面成功应用。

trans.cn: 多重任务：同时或连续执行的多个任务。

sentences.c: Users can perform multiple tasks at the same time.
sentences.cn: 用户可以同时执行多项任务。

sentences.c: Number 6: How can I add multiple tasks at one time?
sentences.cn: 第6个问题：如何一次添加多个任务？

sentences.c: Multiple Tasks can be associated with a Request.
sentences.cn: 任务可以与一个请求联合在一起。
